public OnPlayerEditDynamicObject(playerid, objectid, response, Float: x, Float: y, Float: z, Float: rx, Float: ry, Float: rz)
{
    switch(response)
    {
        case EDIT_RESPONSE_CANCEL:
        {
            if(vwp[playerid] == 0 && innt[playerid] == 0 && pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1)
            {
                SetDynamicObjectPos(objectid, AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][APos][0], AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][APos][1], AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][APos][2]),
                SetDynamicObjectRot(objectid, AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][RotPos][0], AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][RotPos][1], AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][RotPos][2]);
                format(stmsg[playerid], 80, "Object ID %d was canceled from editing.", pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, stmsg[playerid]);
                return 1;
            }
            SetDynamicObjectPos(objectid, Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][fPos][0], Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][fPos][1], Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][fPos][2]), SetDynamicObjectRot(objectid, Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][Rot][0], Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][Rot][1], Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][Rot][2]),
            SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x2479B5FF, pInfo[playerid][aVar][116] == 1 ? ("* Furniture object has been added in your house.") : ("* Furniture object has been edited."));
        }
        case EDIT_RESPONSE_FINAL:
        {
            if(vwp[playerid] == 0 && innt[playerid] == 0 && pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1)
            {
                AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][APos][0] = x, AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][APos][1] = y, AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][APos][2] = z,
                AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][RotPos][0] = rx, AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][RotPos][1] = ry, AObjects[pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][RotPos][2] = rz;
                SetDynamicObjectPos(objectid, x, y, z), SetDynamicObjectRot(objectid, rx, ry, rz);
                return 1;
            }
            Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][fPos][0] = x, Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][fPos][1] = y, Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][fPos][2] = z,
            Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][Rot][0] = rx, Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][Rot][1] = ry, Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]][Rot][2] = rz;
            SetDynamicObjectPos(objectid, x, y, z), SetDynamicObjectRot(objectid, rx, ry, rz), SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x2479B5FF, pInfo[playerid][aVar][116] == 1 ? ("* Furniture object has been added in your house.") : ("* Furniture object has been edited."));
            mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 240, "UPDATE `furniture` SET `PosX`=%f, `PosY`=%f, `PosZ`=%f, `RotX`=%f, `RotY`=%f, `RotZ`=%f WHERE `HouseID`=%d AND `Objd`=%d", x, y, z, rx, ry, rz, pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1, pInfo[playerid][aVar][53]), mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
        }
    }
    return 1;
}
public OnPlayerSelectDynamicObject(playerid, objectid, modelid, Float:x, Float:y, Float:z)
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][116] == 3)
    {
        if(vwp[playerid] == 0 && innt[playerid] == 0 && pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1)
        {
            for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(AObjects); i++) if(IsValidDynamicObject(AObjects[i][ObID]) && AObjects[i][ObID] == objectid)
                return DestroyDynamicObject(objectid), AObjects[i][ObID] = -1, format(stmsg[playerid], 80, "Object ID %d has been deleted.", i), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, stmsg[playerid]);
            return 1;
        }
        if(gtm < pInfo[playerid][aSpam][5]) return 0;
        for(new i = 0; i < 60; ++i) if(IsValidDynamicObject(Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][i][HouseID]) && Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][i][HouseID] == objectid)
            return DestroyDynamicObject(objectid), CancelEdit(playerid), SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x2479B5FF, "* You deleted a furniture object from your house."),  format(qiMYSQL, 100, "DELETE FROM `furniture` WHERE `HouseID` = %d AND `ID` = %d", pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1, Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][i][ID]), mysql_pquery(MySQLCon, qiMYSQL), 1;
    }
    if(vwp[playerid] == 0 && innt[playerid] == 0 && pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1)
    {
        for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(AObjects); i++) if(IsValidDynamicObject(AObjects[i][ObID]) && AObjects[i][ObID] == objectid)
            return pInfo[playerid][aVar][53] = i, EditDynamicObject(playerid, objectid), 1;
    }
    if(gtm < pInfo[playerid][aSpam][5]) return 0;
    for(new i = 0; i < 60; ++i) if(IsValidDynamicObject(Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][i][HouseID]) && Furn[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]+1][i][HouseID] == objectid)
        return pInfo[playerid][aVar][53] = i, EditDynamicObject(playerid, objectid), 1;
    return 1;
}
public OnPlayerWeaponShot(playerid, weaponid, hittype, hitid, Float:fX, Float:fY, Float:fZ)
{
    if(hittype == 1)
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][78] == 1 && weaponid == 25) TogglePlayerControllable(hitid, 0),
            ApplyAnimation(hitid, "CRACK", "crckdeth2", 4.1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0), SetTimerEx("ClearTazer", 8000, false, "i", hitid);
        if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] == pInfo[hitid][pMember] && (Iter_Contains(Warp, hitid) || Iter_Contains(Warp2, hitid))) return 0;
        if((Iter_Contains(Warp, hitid) && (!(IsPlayerInArea(playerid, Turfs[WarNR-1][MinX],Turfs[WarNR-1][MinY],Turfs[WarNR-1][MaxX],Turfs[WarNR-1][MaxY]) || IsPlayerInArea(hitid, Turfs[WarNR-1][MinX],Turfs[WarNR-1][MinY],Turfs[WarNR-1][MaxX],Turfs[WarNR-1][MaxY]))))
            || (Iter_Contains(Warp2, hitid) && (!(IsPlayerInArea(playerid, Turfs[War2NR-1][MinX],Turfs[War2NR-1][MinY],Turfs[War2NR-1][MaxX],Turfs[War2NR-1][MaxY]) || IsPlayerInArea(hitid, Turfs[War2NR-1][MinX],Turfs[War2NR-1][MinY],Turfs[War2NR-1][MaxX],Turfs[War2NR-1][MaxY])))) || vwp[playerid] == 999) return 0;
    }
    if(pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1 && (weaponid == 38 || weaponid == 36 || weaponid == 35)) format(strAll,sizeof(strAll),"%s was kicked from the server by AdmBot, reason: Suspect Weapons Cheats.", GetName(playerid)), SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_RED, strAll), Kick(playerid);
    if(hittype == BULLET_HIT_TYPE_PLAYER_OBJECT && IsValidPlayerObject(playerid, hitid))
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][82] != 0)
        {
            if(hitid == pInfo[playerid][pLs][16] || hitid == pInfo[playerid][pLs][17])
            {
                pInfo[playerid][aVar][82]++, DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, hitid), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~g~successfully ~w~broken padlock", 3000, 3);
                if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][82] == 3) MovePlayerObject(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pLs][18], 2142.29199, 1627.09631, 994.27753, 1.0), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~g~successfully ~w~broken padlock~n~shoots ~r~switches ~w~for alarms", 5500, 3),
                    SetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, 2144.2407,1641.5730,993.5761, 2.0), CP[playerid] = 293;
            }
            if(hitid == pInfo[playerid][pLs][14] || hitid == pInfo[playerid][pLs][15])
            {
                for(new i = 0; i < 8; ++i) DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pLs][i]);
                pInfo[playerid][aVar][82]++, DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, hitid), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~g~successfully ~w~broken switches~n~~w~alarm 1 ~r~disabled", 3000, 3);
                if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][82] == 5)
                {
                    for(new i = 8; i < 14; ++i) DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pLs][i]);
                    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~g~successfully ~w~broken switches~n~~w~alarm 2 ~r~disabled", 5000, 3);
                }
            }
        }
        if(vwp[playerid] == 999)
        {
            for(new i = 0; i < 20; ++i) if(hitid == pInfo[playerid][wlic][i])
            {
                if(pInfo[playerid][pTog][3] == 1) PlayerPlaySound(playerid,17802,0.0,0.0,0.0);
                DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, pInfo[playerid][wlic][i]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][45]++, format(pInfo[playerid][pGText], 18, "points: ~y~%d/20", pInfo[playerid][aVar][45]), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, TExam[playerid][1], pInfo[playerid][pGText]);
                if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][45] == 20) SetPlayerHealth(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pTruck]), pInfo[playerid][pGunLic] = 1, pInfo[playerid][pGunLicTime] = 150, GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~g~weapon lesson passed~n~congratulations", 5000, 3),
                    SetPlayerVirtualWorldEx(playerid, 0), SetPlayerInteriorEx(playerid, 0), SetPlayerPos(playerid, Business[pInfo[playerid][aVar][63]][EnterX], Business[pInfo[playerid][aVar][63]][EnterY], Business[pInfo[playerid][aVar][63]][EnterZ]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][63] = -1, PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, TExam[playerid][0]), PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, TExam[playerid][1]), ResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
                return 1;
            }
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

public OnPlayerTakeDamage(playerid, issuerid, Float: amount, weaponid, bodypart)
{
    if(issuerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimChecked])
    {
        E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimLastTenDamage][E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimChecks]] = amount,
        E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimLastTenParts][E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimChecks]] = bodypart,
        E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimLastTenWeapon][E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimChecks]] = weaponid, E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimChecks]++;
        if(E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimChecks] == 10)
        {
            E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimChecks] = 0, E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimChecked] = false;
            format(AdminWText, sizeof(AdminWText), "Anti-Cheat: Aimbot report for %s.", GetName(issuerid));
            SendAdminMessage(playerid, COLOR_ADMWARNING, AdminWText);
            for(new i = 0; i < 10; i++)
            {
                new weaponName[30], bpart[10];
                switch(E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimLastTenParts][i])
                {
                    case 3: bpart = "Torso";
                    case 4: bpart = "Chest";
                    case 5: bpart = "Left Arm";
                    case 6: bpart = "Right Arm";
                    case 7: bpart = "Left Leg";
                    case 8: bpart = "Right Leg";
                    case 9: bpart = "Head";
                    default: bpart = "Unknown";
                }
                GetWeaponName(E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimLastTenWeapon][i], weaponName, sizeof(weaponName));
                format(AdminWText, sizeof(AdminWText), "> (%d) Damage done - %.1f, Weapon - %s, Body Part - %s", i+1, E_AIMBOT[issuerid][aimLastTenDamage][i], weaponName, bpart);
                SendAdminMessage(playerid, COLOR_ADMWARNING, AdminWText);
            }
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

strscramble(src[], dest[], ssize = sizeof src, dsize = sizeof dest) {
    if (dsize < ssize) {
        return false;
    }
    strcat(dest, src, dsize);
    ssize = strlen(src);
    dsize = 0;

    while (dsize != ssize) 
    {
        #if defined WHILE_DEBUG
            print("[DEBUG] Strscramble while is active.");
        #endif
    
        swap(dest[dsize], dest[dsize + random (ssize - dsize)]);
        dsize++;
    }
    return true;
}

stock RandomMathEvent()
{
    new operation = random(4), numbers, result, string[100], small_str[16], prize = 1200 + RandomEx(2500, 3801);
    format(string, sizeof(string), "Math Event: Primul care va tasta rezultatul ");
    switch(operation)
    {
        case 0: // +
        {
            numbers = 2 + random(4);
            for(new i = 0, number; i < numbers; i++) number = 1 + random(50), format(small_str, sizeof(small_str), "%s%d+", small_str, number), result += number;
            small_str[strlen(small_str) - 1] = EOS, strcat(string, small_str);  
        }
        case 1: // -
        {
            numbers = 2 + random(4);
            for(new i = 0, number; i < numbers; i++) number = 1 + random(50), number = -number, format(small_str, sizeof(small_str), "%s%d", small_str, number), result += number;
            strcat(string, small_str);
        }
        case 2: // *
        {
            numbers = 2 + random(3), result = 1;
            for(new i = 0, number; i < numbers; i++) number = 1 + random(50), format(small_str, sizeof(small_str), "%s%d*", small_str, number), result *= number;
            small_str[strlen(small_str) - 1] = EOS, strcat(string, small_str);
        }
        case 3: // sqrt
        {
            new number = 1 + random(125);
            result = floatround(floatsqroot(float(number * number))), format(small_str, sizeof (small_str), "V%d", number * number);
            strcat(string, small_str);
        }
    }
    format(string, sizeof(string), "%s will win %s$.", string, FormatNumber(prize)), SendClientMessageToAll(0xADD63CFF, string);
    TEvent = 3, TEventReward = prize, MathEvent_Active = true, MathEvent_Result = result;
}

    new saveweapon[13], saveammo[13];
    for(new slot = 0; slot < 13; slot++) GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, slot, saveweapon[slot], saveammo[slot]);
    ResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
    for(new slot; slot < 13; slot++)
    {
        if(saveweapon[slot] == weaponid || saveammo[slot] == 0) continue;
        GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, saveweapon[slot], saveammo[slot]);
    }
    return 1;
}

public Firework(playerid, i)
{
    new Float:x, Float:y, Float:z;
    x = Frx[playerid][i], y = Fry[playerid][i], z = Frz[playerid][i], z += 73;
    if(RocketExplosions[playerid][i] == 0) DestroyObject(Rocket[playerid][i]), DestroyObject(RocketLight[playerid][i]), DestroyObject(RocketSmoke[playerid][i]),
        CreateExplosion(x ,y, z, 4, 10), CreateExplosion(x ,y, z, 5, 10), CreateExplosion(x ,y, z, 6, 10);
    else if(RocketExplosions[playerid][i] >= 5)
    {
        for(new j = 0; j <= 50; j++) CreateExplosion(x + float(j - (50 / 2)), y, z, 7, 10),
            CreateExplosion(x, y + float(j - (50 / 2)), z, 7, 10), CreateExplosion(x, y, z + float(j - (50 / 2)), 7, 10);
        RocketExplosions[playerid][i] = -1, pInfo[playerid][aVar][80] = 0, pInfo[playerid][aVar][81] = 0;
        return 1;
    }
    else x += float(random(50) - (50 / 2)), y += float(random(50) - (50 / 2)),
        z += float(random(50) - (50 / 2)), CreateExplosion(x, y, z, 7, 10);
    RocketExplosions[playerid][i]++, SetTimerEx("Firework", 300, 0, "ii", playerid, i);
    return 1;
}

        {

        }
    }
    if(HR_Prepare)
    {

        {

    }
    return 1;
}
forward ProxDetectorS(Float:radi, playerid, targetid);
public ProxDetectorS(Float:radi, playerid, targetid)
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][70] == -1 && pInfo[targetid][aVar][70] == -1)
    {
        GetPlayerPos(targetid, POSS[0], POSS[1], POSS[2]);
        if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, radi, POSS[0], POSS[1], POSS[2])) return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
forward ChangeWeather();
public ChangeWeather()
{
    switch(DTxt[1])
    {
        case 1, 2, 3, 12:
        {
            new winterrand = random(sizeof(WinterWeather));
            SetWeather(WinterWeather[winterrand]);
        }
        case 4, 5:
        {
            new springrand = random(sizeof(SpringWeather));
            SetWeather(SpringWeather[springrand]);
        }
        case 6, 7, 8:
        {
            new summerrand = random(sizeof(SummerWeather));
            SetWeather(SummerWeather[summerrand]);
        }
        default:
        {
            new autumnrand = random(sizeof(AutumnWeather));
            SetWeather(AutumnWeather[autumnrand]);
        }
    }
    SendClientMessageToAll(0xF7B934FF, RandTxtInf[random(7)]);
    return 1;
}

stock GangZoneCreateEx( Float:gzMinX,Float:gzMinY,Float:gzMaxX,Float:gzMaxY, gznumber , Float:numsize )
{
    new gid = GangZoneCreate(gzMinX,gzMinY,gzMaxX,gzMaxY), Float:centposx,Float:centposy;
    Turfs[gid][zexist] = true, centposx = (gzMinX+gzMaxX) / 2, centposy = (gzMinY+gzMaxY) / 2;

    // Borders
    Turfs[gid][border][0] = GangZoneCreate( gzMinX-2.0, gzMinY, gzMinX+2.0, gzMaxY );
    Turfs[gid][border][1] = GangZoneCreate( gzMinX-2.0, gzMaxY-2.0, gzMaxX, gzMaxY+2.0 );
    Turfs[gid][border][2] = GangZoneCreate( gzMaxX-2.0, gzMinY, gzMaxX+2.0, gzMaxY );
    Turfs[gid][border][3] = GangZoneCreate( gzMinX-2.0, gzMinY-2.0, gzMaxX, gzMinY+2.0 );

    // Numbers
    if(gznumber >= 0 && gznumber <= 9) GangZoneCreateNumber(gid,gznumber,centposx,centposy,numsize);
    else if(gznumber > 9 && gznumber <= 50)
    {
        new temp[3],gznum1[2],gznum2[2];
        format(temp,sizeof temp,"%d",gznumber), strmid(gznum1,temp,0,1), strmid(gznum2,temp,1,2);
        GangZoneCreateNumber(gid,strval(gznum1),centposx-(40.0*numsize),centposy,numsize);
        GangZoneCreateNumber2(gid,strval(gznum2),centposx+(40.0*numsize),centposy,numsize);
    }
    else return gid;
    return gid;
}
stock GangZoneCreateNumber(gzid , gznum , Float:centposx , Float:centposy , Float:numsize)
{
    switch(gznum)
    {
        case 0:
        {
            new Float:gztk = 4.0*numsize, Float:gsdisx = 15.0*numsize, Float:gsdisy = 20.0*numsize;
            Turfs[gzid][npart][0] = GangZoneCreate(centposx-gsdisx-gztk,centposy-gsdisy-gztk,centposx+gsdisx+gztk,centposy-gsdisy+gztk); // Down of 0

forward OnTurfsLoad();
public OnTurfsLoad()
{
    for(new r = 0; r < cache_num_rows(); ++r) {
        new ORM:ormid = Turfs[r][ORM_ID] = orm_create("turfs");

        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Turfs[r][ID], "ID"); //this is the key
        orm_setkey(ormid, "ID"); //here we declare it as the key
        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Turfs[r][Owned], "Owned");
        orm_addvar_float(ormid, Turfs[r][MinX], "MinX");
        orm_addvar_float(ormid, Turfs[r][MinY], "MinY");
        orm_addvar_float(ormid, Turfs[r][MaxX], "MaxX");
        orm_addvar_float(ormid, Turfs[r][MaxY], "MaxY");
        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Turfs[r][Nr], "Nr");
        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Turfs[r][NrSize], "NrSize");
        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Turfs[r][TTime], "TTime");
        orm_apply_cache(ormid, r);
        Turfs[r][tID] = GangZoneCreateEx(Turfs[r][MinX], Turfs[r][MinY], Turfs[r][MaxX], Turfs[r][MaxY], Turfs[r][Nr], Turfs[r][NrSize]);
    }
    return 1;
}

{

    {
        cache_get_field_content(0, "Text", string, MySQLCon, 5), format(MP, sizeof(MP), "%s", string), format(AdminWText, sizeof(AdminWText), "Accounts Created: ~y~%s ~w~/ Latest Account: ~y~%s~w~ / Most Players Connect: ~y~%s", FormatNumber(Lf), rhSt, MP), TextDrawSetString(LogT[1], AdminWText);

        cache_get_field_content(2, "Text", PWall[1][K2], MySQLCon, MAX_PLAYER_NAME), cache_get_field_content(5, "Text", PWall[1][NK2], MySQLCon, MAX_PLAYER_NAME),
        cache_get_field_content(3, "Text", PWall[2][K3], MySQLCon, MAX_PLAYER_NAME), cache_get_field_content(6, "Text", PWall[2][NK3], MySQLCon, MAX_PLAYER_NAME);
        format(stmsg[0], 100, "{ED4242}Top Killers\n%s (%s kills)\n%s (%s kills)\n%s (%s kills)", PWall[0][K1], PWall[0][NK1], PWall[1][K2], PWall[1][NK2], PWall[2][K3], PWall[2][NK3]);

forward OnHouseAdd(r, Float:IntP1, Float:IntP2, Float:IntP3, inti, Float:x, Float:y, Float:z, price, lvl);
public OnHouseAdd(r, Float:IntP1, Float:IntP2, Float:IntP3, inti, Float:x, Float:y, Float:z, price, lvl)
{
    new housestr[276];
    Houses[r][EnterX] = x, Houses[r][EnterY] = y, Houses[r][EnterZ] = z, Houses[r][IntX] = IntP1, Houses[r][IntY] = IntP2, Houses[r][IntZ] = IntP3,
    Houses[r][Interior] = inti, Houses[r][Value] = price, Houses[r][Level] = lvl, Houses[r][VW] = r, format(Houses[r][Owner], 9, "TheState"), format(Houses[r][Discription], 15, "No Discription"), orm_update(Houses[r][ORM_ID]);
    format(housestr, sizeof(housestr), "House %d\n{415FD9}This house is for sale!\n{FFFFFF}House Price: {415FD9}%s$\n{FFFFFF}Level: {415FD9}%d\n{FFFFFF}Type {415FD9}/buyhouse {FFFFFF}to buy this house!", Houses[r][ID], FormatNumber(Houses[r][Value]), Houses[r][Level]);
    Houses[r][HouseText3D] = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(housestr, -1, Houses[r][EnterX], Houses[r][EnterY], Houses[r][EnterZ], 9.0, INVALID_PLAYER_ID, INVALID_VEHICLE_ID, 0, -1, -1);
    Houses[r][HousePickup] = CreateDynamicPickup(1273, 23, Houses[r][EnterX], Houses[r][EnterY], Houses[r][EnterZ], -1, -1, -1);
    return 1;
}

public PayDay(playerid)
{
    new rent = 0, checks, BInt;
    if(pInfo[playerid][pPremium] > 0 ? (checks = RandomEx(5078, 5991), BInt = floatround((pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney]/120)*0.3, floatround_round)) : (checks = RandomEx(3610, 4051), BInt = floatround((pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney]/120)*0.1, floatround_round)))
    if(pInfo[playerid][pHouse] != -1 && Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][RentPrice] > 0 && strcmp(Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][Owner], pInfo[playerid][pUser], true))
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][RentPrice]) SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "Ai fost evacuat, nu ai avut destui bani sa platesti chiria."),
            pInfo[playerid][pHouse] = -1, SetPosIV(playerid), DestroyDynamicMapIcon(pInfo[playerid][aVar][24]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][24] = 0, mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `players` SET `House`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d", pInfo[playerid][pHouse], pInfo[playerid][pID]), mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
        else rent = Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][RentPrice], Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][Till] += Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][RentPrice], orm_update(Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][ORM_ID]);
    }

    if(pInfo[playerid][pHouse] != -1 && (!strcmp(Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][Owner], pInfo[playerid][pUser], false)))
    {
        new houseBills = 0;

        format(stmsg[playerid], 160, "{5F5F5F}Electricity House: {FFFFFF}-%s$", FormatNumber(houseBills)), SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, stmsg[playerid]);
    }

    format(stmsg[playerid], 60, "{5F5F5F}New Balance: {FFFFFF}%s$", FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney])), SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, stmsg[playerid]);
    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~g~~h~PayDay", 5000, 1), checks -= rent, GiveMoney(playerid, checks), pInfo[playerid][pRPoints] += 1, pInfo[playerid][pGift]++, pInfo[playerid][pBomboane] ++, Safes[13][Money] += Taxx;
    format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~g~+%s$", FormatNumber(checks)), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", playerid);

	SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "* Ai primit o bomboana.*");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pBomboane] == 2) SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "* Poti sa mergi pe insula Halloween sa dai [/hgift]! *");
    pInfo[playerid][pFPunish] -= pInfo[playerid][pFPunish] > 0 ? (1) : (0), pInfo[playerid][pMP]++;
    if(!IsPlayerAfk(playerid)) pInfo[playerid][pHoursPlayed] += 1;
    if(pInfo[playerid][pRob] < 10 && pInfo[playerid][pPremium] == 0) pInfo[playerid][pRob] += 1;
    if(pInfo[playerid][pRob] < 30 && pInfo[playerid][pPremium] > 0) pInfo[playerid][pRob] += 1;
    if(pInfo[playerid][pEscapePoints] < 10 && pInfo[playerid][pPremium] == 0) pInfo[playerid][pEscapePoints] += 1;
    if(pInfo[playerid][pEscapePoints] < 30 && pInfo[playerid][pPremium] > 0) pInfo[playerid][pEscapePoints] += 1;
    if(pInfo[playerid][pSpinGift] < 4) pInfo[playerid][pSpinGift] += 1;
    switch(pInfo[playerid][pCarLic])
    {
        case 2..10: pInfo[playerid][pCarLic]--;
        default: pInfo[playerid][pCarLicTime] -= pInfo[playerid][pCarLicTime] > 0 ? (1) : (0, pInfo[playerid][pCarLic] = 0);
    }
    switch(pInfo[playerid][pFlyLic])
    {
        case 2..10: pInfo[playerid][pFlyLic]--;
        default: pInfo[playerid][pFlyLicTime] -= pInfo[playerid][pFlyLicTime] > 0 ? (1) : (0, pInfo[playerid][pFlyLic] = 0);
    }
    switch(pInfo[playerid][pBoatLic])
    {
        case 2..10: pInfo[playerid][pBoatLic]--;
        default: pInfo[playerid][pBoatLicTime] -= pInfo[playerid][pBoatLicTime] > 0 ? (1) : (0, pInfo[playerid][pBoatLic] = 0);
    }
    switch(pInfo[playerid][pGunLic])
    {
        case 2..10: pInfo[playerid][pGunLic]--;
        default: pInfo[playerid][pGunLicTime] -= pInfo[playerid][pGunLicTime] > 0 ? (1) : (0, pInfo[playerid][pGunLic] = 0);
    }
    orm_update(Safes[13][ORM_ID]), orm_update(Business[63][ORM_ID]), SafeRefresh(13);
    mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 330, "UPDATE `players` SET `BankMoney`=%d, `MP`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d", pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney], pInfo[playerid][pMP], pInfo[playerid][pID]), mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
    return 1;
}

    }

	format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "%s", GetName(playerid)), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, NamePlayer[playerid], SpStr);

}

forward OnBanCheck(playerid);
public OnBanCheck(playerid)
{
    if(cache_num_rows())
    {
        if(cache_get_field_content_int(0, "UnbanTime") < 0) return cache_get_field_content(0, "Admin", bSt[0]), cache_get_field_content(0, "Reason", bSt[1]), cache_get_field_content(0, "BanTime", bSt[2]),
            format(stmsg[playerid], 165, "Your account/IP was banned permanent by %s, reason: %s, (%s).", bSt[0], bSt[1], bSt[2]), SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xA9C4E4FF, stmsg[playerid]),
            SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xA9C4E4FF, "Post an unban request on our panel. (GeForce.ro/panel)"), SetTimerEx("KickPublic", 50, false, "i", playerid), 1;
        if(cache_get_field_content_int(0, "UnbanTime") < gtm) return format(qiMYSQL, 140, "DELETE FROM `bans` WHERE `Player` = '%s'", GetName(playerid)), mysql_pquery(MySQLCon, qiMYSQL),
            mysql_format(MySQLCon, qiMYSQL, 100, "SELECT * FROM `players` WHERE `user` = '%s' LIMIT 1", GetName(playerid)), mysql_pquery(MySQLCon, qiMYSQL, "OnAccountCheck", "d", playerid), 1;
        cache_get_field_content(0, "Admin", bSt[0]), cache_get_field_content(0, "Reason", bSt[1]), cache_get_field_content(0, "BanTime", bSt[2]),
        format(stmsg[playerid], 169, "Your account/IP was banned temporary by %s, reason: %s, (%s). Ban Expire: (%s).", bSt[0], bSt[1], bSt[2], date(cache_get_field_content_int(0, "UnbanTime"))), SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xA9C4E4FF, stmsg[playerid]),
        SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xA9C4E4FF, "Post an unban request on our panel. (GeForce.ro/panel)"), SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xA9C4E4FF, "If you want to buy Unban contact administrator."), SetTimerEx("KickPublic", 50, false, "i", playerid);
        return 1;
    }
    mysql_format(MySQLCon, qiMYSQL, 80, "SELECT * FROM `players` WHERE `user` = '%s' LIMIT 1", GetName(playerid)), mysql_pquery(MySQLCon, qiMYSQL, "OnAccountCheck", "d", playerid);
    return 1;
}

stock date(timestamp)
{
    new year=1970, day=0, month=0, hour=0, mins=0, sec=0, days_of_month[12] = { 31,28,31,30,31,30,31,31,30,31,30,31 }, returnstring[32];
    while(timestamp>31622400) {
        timestamp -= 31536000;
        if (((year % 4 == 0) && (year % 100 != 0)) || (year % 400 == 0)) timestamp -= 86400;
        year++;
    }
    if(((year % 4 == 0) && (year % 100 != 0)) || (year % 400 == 0)) days_of_month[1] = 29;
    else days_of_month[1] = 28;
    while(timestamp>86400) {
        timestamp -= 86400, day++;
        if(day==days_of_month[month]) day=0, month++;
    }
    while(timestamp>60) {
        timestamp -= 60, mins++;
        if(mins == 60) mins=0, hour++;
    }
    sec=timestamp, format(returnstring, 31, "%02d/%02d/%d, %02d:%02d:%02d", day+1, month+1, year, hour, mins, sec);
    return returnstring;
}

{
    switch(newstate)
    {
        case PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER:
        {
            pInfo[playerid][aVar][1] = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "Press 2 to start/stop the engine, press R to listen music.");
            format(pInfo[playerid][pGText], 24, "~y~%s", g_VehicleNames[GetVehicleModel(pInfo[playerid][aVar][1])-400]), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pGText], 1000, 1);
            if(IsABike(pInfo[playerid][aVar][1]) ?
                (TSpeedometer[playerid][2] = CreatePlayerTextDraw(playerid,506.000000, 372.000000, "Loading..."),//Status
                PlayerTextDrawBackgroundColor(playerid,TSpeedometer[playerid][2], 250),
                PlayerTextDrawFont(playerid,TSpeedometer[playerid][2], 1),
                PlayerTextDrawLetterSize(playerid,TSpeedometer[playerid][2], 0.289999, 1.399999),
                PlayerTextDrawColor(playerid,TSpeedometer[playerid][2], -1),

stock SetPlayerLookAt(playerid, Float: x, Float: y) 
{
    new Float: Px, Float: Py, Float: Pa;
    GetPlayerPos(playerid, Px, Py, Pa), Pa = floatabs(atan((y - Py) / (x - Px)));
    if(x <= Px && y >= Py) Pa = floatsub(180.0, Pa);
    else if(x < Px && y < Py) Pa = floatadd(Pa, 180.0);
    else if(x >= Px && y <= Py) Pa = floatsub(360.0, Pa);
    Pa = floatsub(Pa, 90.0);
    if(Pa >= 360.0) Pa = floatsub(Pa, 360.0);
    SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid, Pa);
}

public OnVehicleMod(playerid,vehicleid,componentid)
{
    switch(componentid) { case 1008..1010: if(IsPlayerInInvalidNosVehicle(playerid)) RemoveVehicleComponent(vehicleid, componentid); }
    if(!IsComponentidCompatible(GetVehicleModel(vehicleid), componentid)) RemoveVehicleComponent(vehicleid, componentid); 
    if(GetPlayerInterior(playerid) == 0) return Kick(playerid), 0;
    return 1;
}
stock IsPlayerInInvalidNosVehicle(playerid)
{
    #define MAX_INVALID_NOS_VEHICLES 52
    new InvalidNosVehicles[MAX_INVALID_NOS_VEHICLES] =
    {
        581,523,462,521,463,522,461,448,468,586,417,425,469,487,512,520,563,593,
        509,481,510,472,473,493,520,595,484,430,453,432,476,497,513,533,577,
        452,446,447,454,590,569,537,538,570,449,519,460,488,511,519,548,592
    };
    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
        { for(new i = 0; i < MAX_INVALID_NOS_VEHICLES; i++) { if(GetVehicleModel(pInfo[playerid][aVar][1]) == InvalidNosVehicles[i]) return true; } }
    return false;
}
stock IsComponentidCompatible(modelid, componentid)
{
    if(componentid == 1025 || componentid == 1073 || componentid == 1074 || componentid == 1075 || componentid == 1076 ||
         componentid == 1077 || componentid == 1078 || componentid == 1079 || componentid == 1080 || componentid == 1081 ||
         componentid == 1082 || componentid == 1083 || componentid == 1084 || componentid == 1085 || componentid == 1096 ||
         componentid == 1097 || componentid == 1098 || componentid == 1087 || componentid == 1086)
         return true;
 
    switch(modelid)

forward sStats();
public sStats()
{
    foreach(new i : Player) if(pInfo[i][pStatus] == 1)
    {
        if(pInfo[i][pSleep] != 1) GetPlayerHealth(i, health), SetPlayerHealth(i, pInfo[i][pUpgr][2] > 3 ? (health-2.0) : (health-4.0));
        mysql_format(MySQLCon, qUp, 1000, "UPDATE `players` SET `Money` = %d, `Score`=%d, `Mute`=%d, `HoursPlayed`=%d, `RPoints`=%d, `WantedLevel`=%d, `Walkie`=%d, `MinerSkill`=%d, `Gift`=%d, `Suu`=%d, `Inj`=%d, `Staff`=%d, `Job`=%d, `Jailed`=%d, `Premium`=%d, `Materials`=%d, `Drugs`=%d, `Member`=%d, `Rank`=%d, `Fish`=%d, `Pay`=%d, `RPT`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d",
        pInfo[i][pMoney], pInfo[i][pScore], pInfo[i][pMute], pInfo[i][pHoursPlayed], pInfo[i][pRPoints], pInfo[i][pWantedLevel],
        pInfo[i][pWalkie], pInfo[i][pMinerSkill], pInfo[i][pGift], pInfo[i][pSuu], pInfo[i][pInj], pInfo[i][pStaff], pInfo[i][pJob], pInfo[i][pJailed], pInfo[i][pPremium], pInfo[i][pMaterials], pInfo[i][pDrugs],
        pInfo[i][pMember], pInfo[i][pRank], pInfo[i][pFish], pInfo[i][pPay]-gtm, pInfo[i][pRPT], pInfo[i][pID]);
        mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, qUp);

        mysql_format(MySQLCon, qUp, 1000, "UPDATE `players` SET `CarLic`=%d, `FlyLic`=%d, `BoatLic`=%d, `GunLic`=%d, `CarLicTime`=%d, `FlyLicTime`=%d, `BoatLicTime`=%d, `GunLicTime`=%d, `Warns`=%d, `Bail`=%d, `SweepSkill`=%d, `Deaths`=%d, `Kills`=%d, `Rob`=%d, `AJailed`=%d, `FPunish`=%d, `X`=%f, `Y`=%f, `Z`=%f, `Interior`=%d, `VW`=%d, `RobSkill`=%d, `Fire`=%d, `GC`=%d, `PSK`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d",
        pInfo[i][pCarLic], pInfo[i][pFlyLic], pInfo[i][pBoatLic], pInfo[i][pGunLic], pInfo[i][pCarLicTime],
        pInfo[i][pFlyLicTime], pInfo[i][pBoatLicTime], pInfo[i][pGunLicTime], pInfo[i][pWarns], pInfo[i][pBail], pInfo[i][pSweepSkill], pInfo[i][pDeaths], pInfo[i][pKills], pInfo[i][pRob], pInfo[i][pAJailed], pInfo[i][pFPunish],
        pInfo[i][pPos_x], pInfo[i][pPos_y], pInfo[i][pPos_z], pInfo[i][pInterior], pInfo[i][pVW],
        pInfo[i][pRobSkill], pInfo[i][pFire], pInfo[i][pGasCan], pInfo[i][pPSK], pInfo[i][pID]);
        mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, qUp);

        mysql_format(MySQLCon, qUp, 1000, "UPDATE `players` SET `FarmSkill`=%d, `TruckSkill`=%d, `GarbageSkill`=%d, `StManSkill`=%d, `ExpWtd`=%d, `SkinID`=%d, `Diamonds`=%d, `Clan`=%d, `CRank`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d",
        pInfo[i][pFarmSkill], pInfo[i][pTruckSkill], pInfo[i][pGarbageSkill], pInfo[i][pStManSkill],
        pInfo[i][pExpWtd], pInfo[i][aVar][6] == 0 ? (pInfo[i][pStore][0]) : (pInfo[i][pUnder]), pInfo[i][pDiamonds], pInfo[i][pClan], pInfo[i][pCRank], pInfo[i][pID]);
        mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, qUp);
    }
    GetWeekDay(DTxt[2], DTxt[1], DTxt[0]);
    if(cW < gtm) ChangeWeather(), cW = gtm+900;
    if(tev < gtm && TEvent == 0)
    {
        switch(random(3))
        {
            case 0:
            {
                static const letters[65] = "qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnmmQWERTYUIOPASDFGHJKLZXCVBNNM0123456789";
                for(new i = 0; i < 5 + random(10); i++) FastEventText[i] = letters[random(sizeof(letters))];
                TEventReward = RandomEx(2400, 3401), TEvent = 1;
                SendClientMessageToAll(0xADD63CFF, sprintf("Fast Event: The first one who will type ''{FFA200}%s{ADD63C}'' will win %s$.", FastEventText, FormatNumber(TEventReward)));
            }
            case 1: RandomMathEvent();
            case 2: RandomTriviaEvent();
        }
        tev = gtm+1800;
    }
    return 1;
}

ReturnUser(text[]) {
    new strPos, returnID = 0, bool: isnum = true;
    while(text[strPos]) {
        if(isnum) {
            if ('0' <= text[strPos] <= '9') returnID = (returnID * 10) + (text[strPos] - '0');
            else isnum = false;
        }
        strPos++;
    }
    if(isnum) { if(returnID != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && pInfo[returnID][pStatus] == 1) return returnID; }
    else { foreach(new i : Player) if(pInfo[i][pStatus] == 1 && (!strcmp(pInfo[i][pUser], text, true, strPos) || !strcmp(GetName(i), text, true, strPos))) return i; }
    return INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
}

stock memset(aArray[], iValue, iSize = sizeof (aArray)) {
    new
        iAddress
    ;

    // Store the address of the array
    #emit LOAD.S.pri 12
    #emit STOR.S.pri iAddress

    // Convert the size from cells to bytes
    iSize *= 4;

    // Loop until there is nothing more to fill
    while (iSize > 0) {
        // I have to do this because the FILL instruction doesn't accept a dynamic number.
        if (iSize >= 4096) {
            #emit LOAD.S.alt iAddress
            #emit LOAD.S.pri iValue
            #emit FILL 4096

            iSize    -= 4096;
            iAddress += 4096;
        } else if (iSize >= 1024) {
            #emit LOAD.S.alt iAddress
            #emit LOAD.S.pri iValue
            #emit FILL 1024

            iSize    -= 1024;
            iAddress += 1024;
        } else if (iSize >= 256) {
            #emit LOAD.S.alt iAddress
            #emit LOAD.S.pri iValue
            #emit FILL 256

            iSize    -= 256;
            iAddress += 256;
        } else if (iSize >= 64) {
            #emit LOAD.S.alt iAddress
            #emit LOAD.S.pri iValue
            #emit FILL 64

            iSize    -= 64;
            iAddress += 64;
        } else if (iSize >= 16) {
            #emit LOAD.S.alt iAddress
            #emit LOAD.S.pri iValue
            #emit FILL 16

            iSize    -= 16;
            iAddress += 16;
        } else {
            #emit LOAD.S.alt iAddress
            #emit LOAD.S.pri iValue
            #emit FILL 4

            iSize    -= 4;
            iAddress += 4;
        }
    }

    // aArray is used, just not by its symbol name
    #pragma unused aArray
}

stock IsValidNick(const password[])
{
    for(new i = 0; password[i] != EOS; ++i)
    {
        switch(password[i])
        {
            case '0'..'9', 'A'..'Z', 'a'..'z', '[', ']', '.', '_', '@', '(', ')': continue;
            default: return 0;
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

ShowStats(playerid, targetid)
{
    if(targetid == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[targetid][pStatus] != 1) return 1;
    SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x00FF00FF, "---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
    new Stats[8][38], costlevel = pInfo[targetid][pScore]*levelcost, Player_Weapons[13], Player_Ammos[13], weaponName[40];

    switch(pInfo[targetid][pJob]) {
        case 0: Stats[1] = "Unemployed";
        case 1: Stats[1] = "Detective";
        case 2: Stats[1] = "Street Sweeper";
        case 3: Stats[1] = "Farmer";
        case 4: Stats[1] = "Trucker";
        case 5: Stats[1] = "Pizza Boy";
        case 6: Stats[1] = "Garbage Man";
        case 7: Stats[1] = "Arms Dealer";
        case 8: Stats[1] = "Drugs Dealer";
        case 9: Stats[1] = "StuntMan";
        case 10: Stats[1] = "Mechanic";
        case 11: Stats[1] = "Miner";
        case 12: Stats[1] = "Fisher";
		case 13: Stats[1] = "Bus Driver";
		case 14: Stats[1] = "Colindator"; }
    if(pInfo[targetid][pMute] == -1 ? (Stats[5] = "No") : (format(Stats[5], 37, "Yes, %d sec.", pInfo[targetid][pMute])))
    switch(pInfo[targetid][pPremium]) {
        case 0: Stats[6] = "No";
        default:
        {
            if(pInfo[targetid][pPremium]-gtm >= 86400) format(Stats[6], 37, "Yes, (%d Days)", (pInfo[targetid][pPremium]-gtm) / 86400);
            else format(Stats[6], 37, "Yes, (%d Hours)", ((pInfo[targetid][pPremium]-gtm) / 3600) % 24);
        } }
    switch(pInfo[targetid][pRank]) {
        case 0..6: format(Stats[7], 3, "%d", pInfo[targetid][pRank]);
        case 10: format(Stats[7], 7, "Leader"); }
    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GROVE, "{008f00}=======================================");
    format(stmsg[playerid], 210, "(#) Nume:[%s] | Sex: [%s] | Varsta: [%d] | Bani: [%s$] | Banca: [%s$] | Job: [%s] | Numar Telefon: [%d]", GetName(targetid), pInfo[targetid][pSex] == 1 ? ("Male") : ("Female"), pInfo[targetid][pAge], FormatNumber(pInfo[targetid][pMoney]), FormatNumber(pInfo[targetid][pBankMoney]), Stats[1], pInfo[targetid][pPhoneNumber]),
    SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xCBCCCEFF, stmsg[playerid]);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 145, "(#) Nivel: [%d] | Respect: [%d/%d] | Next Nivel: [%s$] | Ore Jucate: [%d] | Cont Premium: [%s] | Puncte Upgrade: [{00BA19}%d]", pInfo[targetid][pScore], pInfo[targetid][pRPoints], pInfo[targetid][pScore]*levelexp, FormatNumber(costlevel), pInfo[targetid][pHoursPlayed], Stats[6], pInfo[targetid][pUPoints]),
    SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xCBCCCEFF, stmsg[playerid]);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 166, "(#) Crime: %d | Morti: %d | Cazier: %s | AdminJail: %s | Mute: %s | Diamante: {4EE2EC}%d {C2C2C2}| Artificii: %d | Injectii: %d", pInfo[targetid][pKills], pInfo[targetid][pDeaths], pInfo[targetid][pJailed] == -1 ? ("No") : ("Yes"), pInfo[targetid][pAJailed] == -1 ? ("No") : ("Yes"), Stats[5], pInfo[targetid][pDiamonds], pInfo[targetid][pFire], pInfo[targetid][pInj]),
    SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xCBCCCEFF, stmsg[playerid]);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 250, "(#) Wanted: %d | PRob: %d | Droguri: %d Grame | Materiale: %d | Warn: %d/3 | Refferal ID: %d | Frecventa: %d | Puncte Escape: %d", pInfo[targetid][pWantedLevel], pInfo[targetid][pRob], pInfo[targetid][pDrugs], pInfo[targetid][pMaterials], pInfo[targetid][pWarns], pInfo[targetid][pID], pInfo[targetid][pWalkie], pInfo[targetid][pEscapePoints]),
    SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xCBCCCEFF, stmsg[playerid]);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 177, "(#) Factiune: %s (%d zile) | Rank: %s | FPunish: %d/60 | FWarn: %d/3 | Raport: %d", facName[pInfo[targetid][pMember]], pInfo[targetid][pMember] > 0 ? (Days(pInfo[targetid][pDays])) : (0), Stats[7], pInfo[targetid][pFPunish], pInfo[targetid][pFWarns], pInfo[targetid][pRPT]),
    SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xCBCCCEFF, stmsg[playerid]);
    if(pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] > 0) format(stmsg[playerid], 126, "{f15928}(#) Afacere: %d | Casa: %d | Clan ID: %d (-1 = Fara) | Clan Rank: %d", pInfo[targetid][pBusiness] == 355 ? (0) : (pInfo[targetid][pBusiness]+1), pInfo[targetid][pHouse] == -1 ? (0) : (pInfo[targetid][pHouse]+1), pInfo[targetid][pClan]+1, pInfo[targetid][pCRank]), SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x46F700FF, stmsg[playerid]);
    if(pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] > 0) format(stmsg[playerid], 126, "{f15928}(#) Reporturi Acceptate: %d | Admin: %d | Helper: %d | AdminWarn: N/A | AdminWarnExpire: N/A", pInfo[playerid][pStaff], pInfo[playerid][pAdmin], pInfo[playerid][pHelper]), SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x46F700FF, stmsg[playerid]);
    if(pInfo[playerid][pHelper] > 0) format(stmsg[playerid], 126, "{f15928}(#) Intrebari Acceptate: %d | Helper: %d | HelperWarn: N/A | HelperWarnExpire: N/A", pInfo[playerid][pStaff], pInfo[playerid][pHelper]), SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x46F700FF, stmsg[playerid]);
    stmsg[playerid] = "";
    for(new i = 1; i <= 12; i++)
    {
        GetPlayerWeaponData(targetid,i,Player_Weapons[i],Player_Ammos[i]);
        if(Player_Weapons[i] != 0) costlevel = 1, GetWeaponName(Player_Weapons[i], weaponName, sizeof(weaponName)), format(stmsg[playerid],200,"%sWeapon - %s: {828282}%d {A8A8A8}bullets. ",stmsg[playerid], weaponName,Player_Ammos[i]);

    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GROVE, "{008f00}=======================================");
    return 1;
}

stock FormatNumber(Float:amount,delimiter[2]=".")
{
    format(txxt, 16, "%d", floatround(amount)), lz = strlen(txxt);
    if(amount < 0)
    {
        if(lz >= 5) strins(txxt,delimiter,lz-3);
        if(lz >= 8) strins(txxt,delimiter,lz-6);
        if(lz >= 11) strins(txxt,delimiter,lz-9);
    }
    else
    {
        if(lz >= 4) strins(txxt,delimiter,lz-3);
        if(lz >= 7) strins(txxt,delimiter,lz-6);
        if(lz >= 10) strins(txxt,delimiter,lz-9);
    }
    return txxt;
}

public OnPlayerPickUpDynamicPickup(playerid, pickupid)
{
    if(qActive && qPick[pickupid])
    {
        DestroyDynamicPickup(pickupid), GiveMoney(playerid, qPrize), qCount--, qPick[pickupid] = false;
        format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~g~+%s$",FormatNumber(qPrize)), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", playerid);
        format(strAll, sizeof(strAll), "[QUEST] %s a gasit un dovleac, acesta a primit %s$, felicitari! (dovleci ramasi: %d)", GetName(playerid), FormatNumber(qPrize), qCount), SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_YELLOW, strAll);
        if(qCount == 0) qActive = false, SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_YELLOW, "[QUEST] Quest-ul a luat sfarsit. Toate cadourile au fost gasite, felicitari tuturor jucatorilor norocosi.");
        return 1;
    }
    if(pickupid == pickup_DMV) return format(pInfo[playerid][pGText], 68, "~y~To start driving exam write ~g~/exam~y~.~n~Cost: %s~g~$", FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pScore] * 1000)),
        GameTextForPlayer(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pGText], 4000, 5), 1;

    if(pickupid == pickup[0]) return GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~w~type ~r~/alcoholism ~w~to wake up.", 4000, 3), 1;
    if(pickupid == parachute)
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < 2000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
        return GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 46, 1), GiveMoney(playerid, -2000), 1;
    }
    if(pickupid == pickup_healgshop[0])
    {
        GetPlayerHealth(playerid,health);
        if(health == 100) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You do not need to healed.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < 800) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
        SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~g~Healed", 2500, 3), GiveMoney(playerid, -800);
        format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~r~-800$"), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", playerid);
        return 1;
    }
    if(pickupid == pickup_healgshop[1])
    {
        GetPlayerHealth(playerid,health);
        if(health == 100) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You do not need to healed.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < 800) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
        SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~g~Healed", 2500, 3), GiveMoney(playerid, -800);
        format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~r~-800$"), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", playerid);
        return 1;
    }
    if(pickupid == pickup_healgshop[2]) return SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~g~Healed", 2500, 3), 1;
    if(Iter_Contains(Warp, playerid))
    {
        foreach(new i : Warp)
        {
            if(pickupid == pInfo[i][aVar][66]) return GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health), SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health+20), DestroyDynamicPickup(pInfo[i][aVar][66]);
            if(pickupid == pInfo[i][aVar][67]) return pInfo[playerid][pValue] = RandomEx(1309, 1551), GiveMoney(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pValue]), format(pInfo[playerid][pGText], 30,"~g~+%s$", FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pValue])), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pGText], 5000, 5), DestroyDynamicPickup(pInfo[i][aVar][67]);
            if(pickupid == pInfo[i][aVar][68]) return GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, pInfo[i][aVar][69], pInfo[i][aVar][69] == 24 ? (15) : (60)), DestroyDynamicPickup(pInfo[i][aVar][68]);
        }
    }
    if(Iter_Contains(Warp2, playerid))
    {
        foreach(new i : Warp2)
        {
            if(pickupid == pInfo[i][aVar][66]) return GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health), SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health+20), DestroyDynamicPickup(pInfo[i][aVar][66]);
            if(pickupid == pInfo[i][aVar][67]) return pInfo[playerid][pValue] = RandomEx(1309, 1551), GiveMoney(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pValue]), format(pInfo[playerid][pGText], 30,"~g~+%s$", FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pValue])), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pGText], 5000, 5), DestroyDynamicPickup(pInfo[i][aVar][67]);
            if(pickupid == pInfo[i][aVar][68]) return GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, pInfo[i][aVar][69], pInfo[i][aVar][69] == 24 ? (15) : (60)), DestroyDynamicPickup(pInfo[i][aVar][68]);
        }
    }
    if((pickupid == grovml || pickupid == grovml2) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 9)
    {
        if(Safes[9][Mats] < 40) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Faction safe do not have enough materials. (40)");
        for(new i = 0; i <= 12; i++)
        {
            GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, i, weaponsd[i][0], weaponsd[i][1]);
            if(weaponsd[i][1] != 0 && weaponsd[i][0] == 18) return 1;
        }
        GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 18, 1);
        return 1;
    }
    if((pickupid == ballml || pickupid == ballml2) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 10)
    {
        if(Safes[10][Mats] < 40) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Faction safe do not have enough materials. (40)");
        for(new i = 0; i <= 12; i++)
        {
            GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, i, weaponsd[i][0], weaponsd[i][1]);
            if(weaponsd[i][1] != 0 && weaponsd[i][0] == 18) return 1;
        }
        GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 18, 1);
        return 1;
    }
    if((pickupid == vagml || pickupid == vagml2) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 11)
    {
        if(Safes[11][Mats] < 40) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Faction safe do not have enough materials. (40)");
        for(new i = 0; i <= 12; i++)
        {
            GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, i, weaponsd[i][0], weaponsd[i][1]);
            if(weaponsd[i][1] != 0 && weaponsd[i][0] == 18) return 1;
        }
        GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 18, 1);
        return 1;
    }
    if((pickupid == cml || pickupid == cml2) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 12)
    {
        if(Safes[12][Mats] < 40) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Faction safe do not have enough materials. (40)");
        for(new i = 0; i <= 12; i++)
        {
            GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, i, weaponsd[i][0], weaponsd[i][1]);
            if(weaponsd[i][1] != 0 && weaponsd[i][0] == 18) return 1;
        }
        GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 18, 1);
        return 1;
    }
    return 1;
}

public IsPlayerInArea(playerid, Float:minx2, Float:miny2, Float:maxx2, Float:maxy2)
{

stock GiveMoney(playerid, money)

public OnEnterExitModShop(playerid, enterexit, interiorid)
{
    if(enterexit == 0)
    {
        if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 7.5, 617.5342, -1.9899, 1000.5600)) //Tunning 1
        {
            if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < Business[23][Fee]) return 1;
            format(pInfo[playerid][pGText], 30, "~r~-%s$", FormatNumber(Business[23][Fee]));
            GameTextForPlayer(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pGText], 3500, 3), GiveMoney(playerid, -Business[23][Fee]);
            Business[23][Till] += Business[23][Fee]/2, orm_update(Business[23][ORM_ID]);
            format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~r~-%s$", FormatNumber(Business[23][Fee])), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", playerid);
        }
        else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 7.5, 616.7763, -74.8150, 997.7656)) //Tunning 2
        {
            if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < Business[24][Fee]) return 1;
            format(pInfo[playerid][pGText], 30, "~r~-%s$", FormatNumber(Business[24][Fee]));
            GameTextForPlayer(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pGText], 3500, 3), GiveMoney(playerid, -Business[24][Fee]);
            Business[24][Till] += Business[24][Fee]/2, orm_update(Business[24][ORM_ID]);
            format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~r~-%s$", FormatNumber(Business[24][Fee])), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", playerid);
        }
    }
    return 1;
}
stock IsValidSkin(skin)
{
    switch(skin)
    {
        case 0: return true;// This skin is forbidden since certain animations like cuffed don't apply.
        case 1..73: return true;
        case 74: return false; // This skin is invalid/missing. Using this sets skin to CJ skin(skin ID 0).
        case 75..312: return 1; // A valid skin has been passed. Note ID 74 returns 0, - so this won't get called.
        default: return 0; // Anything else is invalid, so nothing gets returned.
    }
    return -1;
}

CMD:remove(playerid, params [])
{
    if(sscanf(params, "s[11]", params)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/remove [parrot/vest/hat/sunglasses/bandana]");
    if(!strcmp(params, "parrot", true)) RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 5);
    if(!strcmp(params, "vest", true)) RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 0);
    if(!strcmp(params, "hat", true)) RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
    if(!strcmp(params, "sunglasses", true)) RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 2);
    if(!strcmp(params, "bandana", true)) RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 4);
    return 1;
}

CMD:setfreq(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pWalkie] == -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY,"You don't have a Walkie Talkie.");
    if(sscanf(params, "d", strval(params))) return SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x8EC7DCFF, "Syntax: {FFFFFF}/setfreq [Frequency] (1 - 198 | 0 to stop it | 1 - 1800 For Premium User)");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pPremium] == 0 && (strval(params) < 0 || strval(params) > 198)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/setfreq [Frequency] (1 - 198 | 0 to stop it | 1 - 1800 For Premium User)");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pPremium] > 0 && (strval(params) < 0 || strval(params) > 1800)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/setfreq [Frequency] (1 - 198 | 0 to stop it | 1 - 1800 For Premium User)");
    if(strval(params) == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, "You stopped your Walkie Talkie."), pInfo[playerid][pWalkie] = 0, 1;
    pInfo[playerid][pWalkie] = strval(params), format(stmsg[playerid], 60, "You set your Walkie Talkie frequency to %d.0.", strval(params)), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
    return 1;
}

CMD:wt(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pWalkie] == -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You don't have a Walkie Talkie.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pWalkie] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Your Walkie Talkie has no set frequency.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMute] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You cannot speak, you have been muted.");
    if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", params)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/wt [message]");
    format(stmsg[playerid], 154, "[Freq %d.0], %s: %s", pInfo[playerid][pWalkie], GetName(playerid), params);
    
    if(strlen(stmsg[playerid]) < 100) { foreach(new i : Player) if(pInfo[playerid][pWalkie] == pInfo[i][pWalkie]) SendClientMessage(i, 0x13A161FF, stmsg[playerid]); return 1; }
    new text1[97], text2[97];
    strcat(text1, stmsg[playerid]), strcat(text1, "..."), strcat(text2, "..."), strcat(text2, stmsg[playerid][96]);
    foreach(new i : Player) if(pInfo[playerid][pWalkie] == pInfo[i][pWalkie]) SendClientMessage(i, 0x13A161FF, text1), SendClientMessage(i, 0x13A161FF, text2);
    return 1;
}

CMD:vc(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pVIP] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You don't have V.I.P Account.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMute] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You cannot speak, you have been muted.");
    if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", params)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/vc [message]");
    format(stmsg[playerid], 148, "V.I.P %s: %s", GetName(playerid), params);
    if(strlen(stmsg[playerid]) < 100) { foreach(new i : Vips) if(pInfo[i][pTog][9] == 0) SendClientMessage(i, 0xF0375FFF, stmsg[playerid]); return 1; }
    new text1[97], text2[97];
    strcat(text1, stmsg[playerid]), strcat(text1, "..."), strcat(text2, "..."), strcat(text2, stmsg[playerid][96]);
    foreach(new i : Vips) if(pInfo[i][pTog][9] == 0) SendClientMessage(i, 0xF0375FFF, text1), SendClientMessage(i, 0xF0375FFF, text2);
    return 1;
}

CMD:deposit(playerid, params[])
{
    if(!(pInfo[playerid][aVar][63] == 17 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][63] == 53)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not at the bank.");
    new bank;
    if(sscanf(params, "i", bank)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/deposit [amount]");
    if(bank > pInfo[playerid][pMoney] || bank < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
    if(bank < 1 || bank > 500000000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Amount can't be below 1$ or higher than 500.000.000$.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pTotVeh] > -1)
    {
        for(new x = 0; x < 15; ++x) if(Veh[playerid][x][Owner] == pInfo[playerid][pID] && Veh[playerid][x][vTax] == 1)
        {
            new vvTax = floatround(Veh[playerid][x][Value]*0.005, floatround_round);
            if(bank < vvTax) return format(stmsg[playerid], 119, "Pays debts for vehicles tax to again access to bank account and access them, Vehicles Tax: %s$.", FormatNumber(vvTax)),  SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, stmsg[playerid]);
            
            return format(stmsg[playerid], 100, "You paid your debt vehicles, now you can gain access to your %s.", g_VehicleNames[Veh[playerid][x][Model]-400]), GiveMoney(playerid, -vvTax), SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, stmsg[playerid]), Veh[playerid][x][vTax] = 0, 1;
        }
    }
    SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "|___ BANK STATEMENT ___|");
    format(stmsg[playerid], 60, "{5F5F5F}Old Balance: {FFFFFF}%s$", FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney])), SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, stmsg[playerid]);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 60, "{5F5F5F}Deposit: {FFFFFF}%s$", FormatNumber(bank)), SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, stmsg[playerid]), addlog(stmsg[playerid], playerid, 10);
    SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "|----------------------------------------|");
    GiveMoney(playerid, -bank), pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney] += bank;
    format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~r~-%s$",FormatNumber(bank)), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", playerid);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 60, "{5F5F5F}New Balance: {FFFFFF}%s$", FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney])), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, stmsg[playerid]);
    mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `players` SET `BankMoney` = %d, `Money` = %d WHERE `ID` = %d", pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney], pInfo[playerid][pMoney], pInfo[playerid][pID]);
    mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
    return 1;
}
CMD:withdraw(playerid, params[])
{
    if(!(pInfo[playerid][aVar][63] == 17 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][63] == 53 || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1.8, 1153.9735,-1448.9458,15.7969) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1.8, 1497.8223,-1748.9606,15.4453) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1.8, 1838.0894,-1421.2332,13.5625)))
        return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not at the Bank/ATM.");
    new withdraw;
    if(sscanf(params, "i", withdraw)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/withdraw [amount]");
    if(withdraw > pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney] || withdraw < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta in your bank account.");
    GiveMoney(playerid, withdraw-(withdraw/200)), pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney] -= withdraw;
    format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~g~+%s$",FormatNumber(withdraw)), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", playerid);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 100, "* You have withdrawn %s$ from your account, total: %s$, tax: %s$.", FormatNumber(withdraw), FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney]), FormatNumber(withdraw/200));
    SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, stmsg[playerid]), addlog(stmsg[playerid], playerid, 10);
    mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `players` SET `BankMoney` = %d, `Money` = %d WHERE `ID` = %d", pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney], pInfo[playerid][pMoney], pInfo[playerid][pID]);
    mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
    return 1;
}
CMD:transfer(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pHoursPlayed] < 5) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Poti folosi /transfer doar daca ai minim 5 ore jucate.");
    if(!(pInfo[playerid][aVar][63] == 17 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][63] == 53)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not at the Bank.");
    new withdraw, playerto;
    if(sscanf(params, "uis[26]", playerto, withdraw)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/transfer [playerid/name] [amount]");
    if(playerto == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[playerto][pStatus] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player not connected.");
    if(pInfo[playerto][pHoursPlayed] < 5) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player need at least 5 hours played.");
    if(playerid == playerto) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't transfer money yourself.");
    if(withdraw > pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney]) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta in your bank account.");
    if(withdraw < 1000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Amount can't be below 1.000$.");
    pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney] -= withdraw, pInfo[playerto][pBankMoney] += withdraw;
    format(stmsg[playerid], 100, "* You have transferred %s$ to %s bank account.", FormatNumber(withdraw), GetName(playerto)), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, stmsg[playerid]), addlog(stmsg[playerid], playerid, 1);
    format(stmsg[playerto], 100, "* %s has transferred %s$ in your bank account.", GetName(playerid), FormatNumber(withdraw)), SendClientMessage(playerto, COLOR_YELLOW, stmsg[playerto]);
    mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `players` SET `BankMoney` = %d, `Money` = %d WHERE `ID` = %d", pInfo[playerid][pBankMoney], pInfo[playerid][pMoney], pInfo[playerid][pID]), mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
    mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `players` SET `BankMoney` = %d, `Money` = %d WHERE `ID` = %d", pInfo[playerto][pBankMoney], pInfo[playerto][pMoney], pInfo[playerto][pID]), mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
    if(strcmp(PlayerIP(playerid), PlayerIP(playerto), true) == 0) return format(AdminWText, sizeof(AdminWText), "AdmWarning: %s has transferred %s$ on account %s. (Same IP is: %s)", pInfo[playerid][pUser], FormatNumber(withdraw), pInfo[playerto][pUser], PlayerIP(playerid)),
        SendAdminMessage(playerid, COLOR_ADMWARNING, AdminWText), 1;
    format(AdminWText, sizeof(AdminWText), "AdmWarning: %s has transferred %s$ on account %s.", pInfo[playerid][pUser], FormatNumber(withdraw), pInfo[playerto][pUser]),
    SendAdminMessage(playerid, COLOR_ADMWARNING, AdminWText);
    return 1;
}

        if(playerid == targetid) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't find yourself.");

CMD:horsebet(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][83] > 500) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You've already bet on horse races, wait to finish races.");
    if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 35.0, 825.2582,5.4109,1004.1870)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not at the horse betting.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pScore] < 2) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You need at least level 2.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pBetTimer] > gtm) return format(stmsg[playerid], 80, "You must wait %02i:%02i minutes in order to bet again.", (pInfo[playerid][pBetTimer]-gtm)/60, (pInfo[playerid][pBetTimer]-gtm)%60),
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, stmsg[playerid]);
    if(pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0] || pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][1])
    {
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You have already placed a bet or two.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0]) format(stmsg[playerid], 80, "Horse #%d", pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0]),
            SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, stmsg[playerid]);
        if(pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][1]) format(stmsg[playerid], 80, "Horse #%d", pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][1]),
            SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, stmsg[playerid]);
        return 1;
    }
    if(!HR_Time) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You must wait for the race to end.");
    new horses_no, horse_1, horse_2, amount;
    if(sscanf(params, "iiiI(0)", horses_no, amount, horse_1, horse_2)) 
        return SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x8EC7DCFF, "Syntax: {FFFFFF}/horsebet [number of horses (1 or 2)] [bet amount] [horse no(1..6)] [horse no(1..6)]");
    if(horses_no != 1 && horses_no != 2) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "[ERROR]: You can bet only on one or two horses.");
    switch (horses_no)
    {
        case 1:
        {
            if(horse_1 > 6 || horse_1 < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x8EC7DCFF, "Syntax: {FFFFFF}/horsebet 1 [bet amount] [horse no(1..6)]");
            if(horse_2 != 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You choose the one horse option.");
            if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < amount) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
            if(amount > 20000 || amount < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Bet money can't be below 1$ or higher than 20.000$.");
            pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0] = horse_1, pInfo[playerid][pHRPrice] = amount;
            if(pInfo[playerid][pPremium] == 0 ? (pInfo[playerid][pBetTimer] = gtm+300) : (pInfo[playerid][pBetTimer] = gtm+240))
            GiveMoney(playerid, -pInfo[playerid][pHRPrice]);
            format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~r~-%s$",FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pHRPrice])), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", playerid);
            format(stmsg[playerid], 160, "[Horse Race]: You bet %s$ on horse number %d @ %.2f.", FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pHRPrice]), pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0], HR_Odds[horse_1 - 1]);
            SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xE9D78DAA, stmsg[playerid]);
        }
        case 2:
        {
            if((horse_1 > 6 || horse_1 < 1) || (horse_2 < 1 || horse_2 > 6)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x8EC7DCFF, "Syntax: {FFFFFF}/horsebet 2 [bet amount] [horse no(1..6)] [horse no(2..6)]");
            if(horse_1 == horse_2) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't bet on the same horse.");
            if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < amount) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
            if(amount > 40000 || amount < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Bet money can't be below 1$ or higher than 40.000$.");
            pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0] = horse_1, pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][1] = horse_2, pInfo[playerid][pHRPrice] = amount;
            if(pInfo[playerid][pPremium] == 0 ? (pInfo[playerid][pBetTimer] = gtm+300) : (pInfo[playerid][pBetTimer] = gtm+240))
            GiveMoney(playerid, -amount);
            format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~r~-%s$",FormatNumber(amount)), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, ShowMoneyPlus[playerid]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", playerid);
            format(stmsg[playerid], 160, "[Horse Race]: You bet %s$ on horse number %d (1st place) and on horse number %d (2nd place).", FormatNumber(amount), pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0], pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][1]);
            SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xE9D78DAA, stmsg[playerid]);
        }
    }
    return 1;
}
stock SetHorseRaces() 
{
    new s[2];
    static const box_colors[6] = {HR_RED, HR_BLUE, HR_YELLOW, HR_CYAN, HR_PURPLE, HR_GREEN};
    Horse[0] = 1 + random (6);

    // Pozitiile cailor
    new j, bool: ok, i;
    for(i = 1; i < sizeof (Horse); i++) 
    {
        ok = false;
        while(!ok) 
        {
            Horse[i] = 1 + random (6), j = 0;
            while(j < i && Horse[j] != Horse[i]) j++;
            if(j == i) ok = !ok;   
        }
    }
    for(i = 0; i < 6; i++) format(s, sizeof (s), "%d", Horse[i]), TextDrawBoxColor(HorseWinner[i], box_colors[i]), TextDrawSetString(HorseWinner[i], s);
    PayWinners();
}
forward HR_ResetVariables();
public HR_ResetVariables() { HR_Win = false, HR_Stop = false, HR_Again = true; }
stock PayWinners()
{
    new string[80], Float: win, h;
    format(string, sizeof(string), "Race #%d winners:", HR_Cursa), HR_Last_Winners[0] = Horse[0], HR_Last_Winners[1] = Horse[1];
    foreach(new i : HorseP)
    {
        SendClientMessage(i, 0x78EB9AAA, string);
        if(pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][0] > 0 && pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][1] == 0 && pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][0] == Horse[0]) // doar un bilet
        {
            win = pInfo[i][pHRPrice] * HR_Odds[pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][0] - 1], h = floatround(win);
            foreach(new j : HorseP) format(string, sizeof(string), "%s - bet %s$ on horse %d and won %s$.", GetName(i), FormatNumber(pInfo[i][pHRPrice]), Horse[0], FormatNumber(h)),
                SendClientMessage(j, 0x7CA3D7AA, string);
            GiveMoney(i, h), pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][0] = 0, pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][1] = 0, pInfo[i][pHRPrice] = 0;
            continue;
        }
        if(pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][0] > 0 && pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][1] > 0 && pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][0] == Horse[0] && pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][1] == Horse[1]) // 2 bilete
        {
            win = ((HR_Odds[pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][0] - 1] + HR_Odds[pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][1] - 1]) * pInfo[i][pHRPrice]), h = floatround(win);
            foreach(new j : HorseP) format(string, sizeof (string), "%s - bet %s$ on horse %d and %d and won %s$!", GetName(i), FormatNumber(pInfo[i][pHRPrice]), Horse[0], Horse[1], FormatNumber(h)),
                SendClientMessage(j, 0x7CA3D7AA, string);
            GiveMoney(i, h), pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][0] = 0, pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][1] = 0, pInfo[i][pHRPrice] = 0;
            continue;
        }
        pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][0] = 0, pInfo[i][pHR_Tickets][1] = 0, pInfo[i][pHRPrice] = 0;
    }
    SetTimer("NewHorseRaceRound", 11000, false);
    return 1;
}
forward HR_Show(playerid, bool: show, bool: msg);
public HR_Show(playerid, bool: show, bool: msg)
{
    if(playerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && pInfo[playerid][aVar][70] == -1) 
    {
        if(show)
        {
            pInfo[playerid][pBetting] = 1;
            if(HR_Time) for(new i; i < sizeof HorseRaces; i++) TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, HorseRaces[i]);
            else if(!HR_Time && !HR_ClasamentShow) TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, HorseTimeLeft);
            else if(HR_ClasamentShow) for(new i; i < sizeof HorseWinner; i++) TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, HorseWinner[i]);
            if(msg) SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x2479B5FF, "Welcome to Inside Track.");
        }
        else
        {
            pInfo[playerid][pBetting] = 0;
            if(HR_Time) for(new i; i < sizeof HorseRaces; i++) TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, HorseRaces[i]);
            else if(!HR_Time && !HR_ClasamentShow) TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, HorseTimeLeft);
            else if(HR_ClasamentShow) for(new i; i < sizeof HorseWinner; i++) TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, HorseWinner[i]);
            if(msg) 
            {
                SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x2479B5FF, "Hope you come back soon.");
                if(pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0] && !pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][1]) format(stmsg[playerid], 110, "Your bet (horse #%d) for race %d of %s$ is no longer available.", pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0], HR_Cursa, FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pHRPrice])),
                    SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, stmsg[playerid]);
                else if(pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0] && pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][1]) format(stmsg[playerid], 140, "Your bets (horse #%d and #%d) for race %d of $%s are no longer available.", pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0], pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][1], HR_Cursa, FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][pHRPrice])),
                    SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, stmsg[playerid]);
            }
            pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][0] = 0, pInfo[playerid][pHR_Tickets][1] = 0, pInfo[playerid][pHRPrice] = 0;
        }
    }
    return 1;
}
forward NewHorseRaceRound();
public NewHorseRaceRound()
{
    new j;
    foreach(new i : HorseP) if(pInfo[i][pBetting] == 1)
    {            
        for(j = 0; j < sizeof HorseRaces; j++) TextDrawHideForPlayer(i, HorseRaces[j]);
        for(j = 0; j < sizeof HorseWinner; j++) TextDrawHideForPlayer(i, HorseWinner[j]);
        TextDrawHideForPlayer(i, HorseTimeLeft);
    }
    for(j = 0; j < sizeof Horse; j++) Horse[j] = 0;
    HR_Time = 180, HR_Win = false, HR_Stop = false, HR_Again = false, HR_Tested = false, HR_Prepare = false, HR_ClasamentShow = false;
    InitializeHorseRace();
    foreach (new i : HorseP) if(pInfo[i][pBetting] == 1) HR_Show(i, true, false);
    return 1;
}
stock InitializeHorseRace()
{
    new count, str[12], r, Float: cat, Float: rest, Float: cota;
    for(count = 0; count < 6; count++)
    {
        switch(random(2))
        {
            case 0: r = random (900) + 200;
            case 1: r = random (500) + 200;
        }
        cat = r / 100, rest = r % 100, cota = cat + rest / 100, HR_Odds[count] = cota;
        TextDrawBackgroundColor(HorseRaces[6], 0x00ff0033), TextDrawBackgroundColor(HorseRaces[8], 0x00ff0033), TextDrawBackgroundColor(HorseRaces[10], 0x00ff0033),
        TextDrawBackgroundColor(HorseRaces[12], 0x00ff0033), TextDrawBackgroundColor(HorseRaces[14], 0x00ff0033), TextDrawBackgroundColor(HorseRaces[16], 0x00ff0033);

        // Cea mai mare cota - 6,8,10,12,14,16
        new k = 0;
        for(new i = 1; i < sizeof HR_Odds; i++) if(HR_Odds[i] > HR_Odds[k]) k = i;
        TextDrawBackgroundColor(HorseRaces[6 + 2 * k], HR_RED);
        format(str, sizeof str, "%.2f", cota);
        switch (count)
        {
            case 0: TextDrawSetString(HorseRaces[6], str);
            case 1: TextDrawSetString(HorseRaces[8], str);
            case 2: TextDrawSetString(HorseRaces[10], str);
            case 3: TextDrawSetString(HorseRaces[12], str);
            case 4: TextDrawSetString(HorseRaces[14], str);
            case 5: TextDrawSetString(HorseRaces[16], str);
        }
    }
    // Nr. Cursei
    HR_Cursa++, format(str, sizeof str, "Race: %d", HR_Cursa), TextDrawSetString(HorseRaces[18], str);

    // Timpul
    HR_Time = 180, HR_Prepare = false, HR_Stop = false, HR_Again = false;
    return 1;
}

            GameTextForPlayer(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pGText], 4000, 3);
            return 1;
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

CMD:eject(playerid, params [])
{
    if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You need to be in a vehicle to use this.");
    if(GetPlayerState(playerid) != PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_DARKGRAY,"You can only eject people as the driver.");
    new playerto;
    if(sscanf(params, "u", playerto)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/eject [playerid/name]");
    if(playerto == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[playerto][pStatus] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY,"Player not connected.");
    if(playerto == playerid) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't eject yourself.");
    if(IsPlayerInVehicle(playerto, pInfo[playerid][aVar][1])) return RemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerto),
        format(stmsg[playerid], 59, "* You have thrown %s out of the car.", GetName(playerto)), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, stmsg[playerid]),
        format(stmsg[playerto], 59, "* You have been thrown out the car by %s.", GetName(playerid)), SendClientMessage(playerto, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, stmsg[playerto]);
    if(GetPlayerSurfingVehicleID(playerto) == pInfo[playerid][aVar][1]) GetPlayerPos(playerto, POSS[0], POSS[1], POSS[2]), SetPlayerPos(playerto, POSS[0], POSS[1], POSS[2]+5.5);
    return 1;
}

CMD:asellhouse(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 5) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, AdminError);
    new hid;
    if(sscanf(params, "d", hid)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/asellhouse [house ID]");
    if(!strcmp(Houses[hid-1][Owner], "TheState", false)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "This house is already sold.");
    if(hid < 1 || hid > 250 || !IsValidDynamicPickup(Houses[hid-1][HousePickup])) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Invalid house ID.");
    pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10] = ReturnUser(Houses[hid-1][Owner]);
    if(pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && pInfo[pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10]][pStatus] == 1)
        mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 200, "UPDATE `players` SET `House` = -1 WHERE `user` = '%s'", Houses[hid-1][Owner]),
        mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL), pInfo[pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10]][pHouse] = -1,
        format(stmsg[pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10]], 120, "* Casa ta a fost vanduta de administratorul %s.", GetName(playerid)),
        SendClientMessage(pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10], COLOR_RED, stmsg[pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10]]);
    else
        mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 200, "UPDATE `players` SET `House` = -1 WHERE `user` = '%s'", Houses[hid-1][Owner]),
        mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
    format(Houses[hid-1][Owner], MAX_PLAYER_NAME, "TheState"), Houses[hid-1][HPrice] = 0, HBRefresh(1, hid-1), orm_update(Houses[hid-1][ORM_ID]);
    format(AdminWText, sizeof(AdminWText), "{f15928}(#) AdmCmd: %s has sold house ID %d.", GetName(playerid), hid), SendAdminMessage(playerid, COLOR_ADMWARNING, AdminWText);
    return 1;
}

        mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `players` SET `Business` = 355 WHERE `user` = '%s'", Business[hid-1][Owner]),
        mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
    format(Business[hid-1][Owner], MAX_PLAYER_NAME, "TheState"), Business[hid-1][BPrice] = 0, HBRefresh(2, hid-1), orm_update(Business[hid-1][ORM_ID]);
    format(AdminWText, sizeof(AdminWText), "{f15928}(#) AdmCmd: %s has sold business ID %d.", GetName(playerid), hid), SendAdminMessage(playerid, COLOR_ADMWARNING, AdminWText);
    return 1;
}

CMD:asellvehicle(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, AdminError);
    new vehicleid, res[24];
    if(sscanf(params, "ds[24]", vehicleid, res)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/asellvehicle [vehicle ID] [reason]");
    if(!IsValidVehicle(vehicleid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Invalid vehicle ID.");
    if(vVar[1][vehicleid] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Vehicle is not private.");
    foreach(new i : Player)
    {
        for(new ri = 0; ri < 15; ri++) if(Veh[i][ri][ServerID] == vehicleid)
        {
            format(stmsg[i], 120, "* Your vehicle %s (%d) was sold by admin %s, reason: %s.", g_VehicleNames[Veh[i][ri][Model]-400], Veh[i][ri][ServerID], GetName(playerid), res), SendClientMessage(i, COLOR_LIGHTRED, stmsg[i]);
            vVar[1][Veh[i][ri][ServerID]] = 0, DestroyDynamicObject(pInfo[i][aVar][12]), pInfo[i][aVar][12] = 0, DestroyVehicle(Veh[i][ri][ServerID]), vVar[11][Veh[i][ri][ServerID]] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pInfo[i][pTotVeh]--, DestroyDynamicObject(Veh[i][ri][vOsl]), DestroyDynamicObject(Veh[i][ri][vOhd]), DestroyDynamicObject(Veh[i][ri][vTt1]), DestroyDynamicObject(Veh[i][ri][vTt2]);
            mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 100, "UPDATE `players` SET `TotVeh`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d", pInfo[i][pTotVeh], pInfo[i][pID]), mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
            orm_delete(Veh[i][ri][ORM_ID]), memcpy(Veh[i][ri], Veh[MAX_PLAYERS][14], 0, sizeof(Veh[][])*4, sizeof(Veh[][]));

            return 1;
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

CMD:edithouse(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 5) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, AdminError);
    new biz, bid;
    if(sscanf(params, "ii", biz, bid)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/edithouse [Number ID] [Amount]"),
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Number ID: 1) House Value | 2) Lock | 3) Rent Price | 4) Level");
    for(new h = 0; h < sizeof(Houses); h++) if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.5, Houses[h][EnterX], Houses[h][EnterY], Houses[h][EnterZ]))
    {
        switch(biz)
        {
            case 1: Houses[h][Value] = bid, orm_update(Houses[h][ORM_ID]), HBRefresh(1, h);
            case 2:
            {
                if(bid < 0 || bid > 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Amount Lock can't be below 0 or higher than 1.");
                    Houses[h][Lock] = bid, orm_update(Houses[h][ORM_ID]);
            }
            case 3: Houses[h][RentPrice] = bid, orm_update(Houses[h][ORM_ID]), HBRefresh(1, h);
            case 4: Houses[h][Level] = bid, orm_update(Houses[h][ORM_ID]), HBRefresh(1, h);
        }
    }
    return 1;
}
CMD:editbiz(playerid, params[])
{

    for(new h = 0; h < sizeof(Business); h++) if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.5, Business[h][EnterX], Business[h][EnterY], Business[h][EnterZ]))

        {
