    return 1;
}
CMD:createhouse(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 4) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, AdminError);
    new price, lvl, intid, Float:IntP[3], Float:x, Float:y, Float:z;
    if(sscanf(params, "fffddd", IntP[0], IntP[1], IntP[2], intid, price, lvl)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x8EC7DCFF, "Syntax: {FFFFFF}/createhouse [interior X] [interior Y] [interior Z] [interior ID] [price] [level]");
    GetPlayerPos(playerid, x, y, z);
    for(new r = 0; r != sizeof(Houses); r++) if(!IsValidDynamicPickup(Houses[r][HousePickup]))
    {
        new ORM:ormid = Houses[r][ORM_ID] = orm_create("houses",MySQLCon);
        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][ID], "ID"), orm_addvar_string(ormid, Houses[r][Owner], 24, "Owner"), orm_addvar_string(ormid, Houses[r][Discription], 26, "Discription"),
        orm_addvar_float(ormid, Houses[r][EnterX], "EnterX"), orm_addvar_float(ormid, Houses[r][EnterY], "EnterY"),
        orm_addvar_float(ormid, Houses[r][EnterZ], "EnterZ"), orm_addvar_float(ormid, Houses[r][IntX], "IntX"),
        orm_addvar_float(ormid, Houses[r][IntY], "IntY"), orm_addvar_float(ormid, Houses[r][IntZ], "IntZ"),
        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][Interior], "Interior"), orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][Value], "Value"),
        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][Lock], "Lock"), orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][RentPrice], "RentPrice"),
        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][Rentabil], "Rentabil"), orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][Level], "Level"),
        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][VW], "VW"), orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][Till], "Till"), orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][HPrice], "HPrice"),
        orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][hUpg][0], "Hp"), orm_addvar_int(ormid, Houses[r][hUpg][1], "Arm"),
        orm_insert(ormid,"OnHouseAdd","dfffdfffdd", r, IntP[0], IntP[1], IntP[2], intid, x, y, z, price, lvl), orm_setkey(ormid,"ID");
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "* Casa a fost adaugata pe server.");
        return r;
    }
    return 1;
}

CMD:sleep(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pHouse] == -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You don't own/rent a house.");
    if(!(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 60, Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][IntX], Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][IntY], Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][IntZ]))) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not in your house.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pWantedLevel] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are wanted, can not sleep.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pSleep] == 0)
    {
        if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.3, Houses[pInfo[playerid][aVar][61]][IntX], Houses[pInfo[playerid][aVar][61]][IntY], Houses[pInfo[playerid][aVar][61]][IntZ]))
            return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can not sleep near the door.");
        SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "You can leave your character AFK and when you come back type again /sleep."), pInfo[playerid][pSleep] = 1, ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CRACK","crckidle2",4.1,1,0,0,0,0);
        return 1;
    }
    SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "You are back and ready to play."), ClearAnimations(playerid), SetPlayerSkin(playerid, GetPlayerSkin(playerid)), pInfo[playerid][pSleep] = 0;
    return 1;
}

CMD:armour(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pHouse] == -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You don't own/rent a house.");
    if(!(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 60, Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][IntX], Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][IntY], Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][IntZ]))) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not in your house.");
    if(Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][hUpg][1] < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Armour upgrade not available for this house.");
    if(!IsACop(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not part of a team.");
    if(CopDuty[playerid] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "(Duty): Nu esti la datorie, tasteaza '/duty' in HQ.");
    SetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~g~armoured", 3000, 3);
    return 1;
}

CMD:buybiz(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pBusiness] < 355) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You already own a business.");
    for(new h = 0; h < sizeof(Business); h++) if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.5, Business[h][EnterX], Business[h][EnterY], Business[h][EnterZ]))
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][pScore] < Business[h][Level]) return format(stmsg[playerid], 32, "You need at least level %d.", Business[h][Level]), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, stmsg[playerid]);
        if(Business[h][BPrice] > 0)
        {
            if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < Business[h][BPrice]) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
            pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10] = ReturnUser(Business[h][Owner]);
            format(stmsg[playerid], 120, "Buying business ID %d for %s$ from %s.", h+1, FormatNumber(Business[h][BPrice]), Business[h][Owner]), addlog(stmsg[playerid], playerid, 2);
            foreach(new i : Player) if(pInfo[i][pBusiness] == h) pInfo[i][pBusiness] = 355;
            if(pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && pInfo[pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10]][pStatus] == 1)
                mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `players` SET `Business` = 355 WHERE `user` = '%s'", Business[h][Owner]), mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL),
                format(stmsg[pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10]], 160, "* Business-ul tau a fost cumparata de catre %s, ai primit %s$ in schimbul lui, felicitari.", GetName(playerid), FormatNumber(Business[h][BPrice])),
                SendClientMessage(pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10], COLOR_YELLOW, stmsg[pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10]]),
                GiveMoney(pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10], Business[h][BPrice]);
                //format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "~g~+%s$",FormatNumber(Business[h][BPrice])), PlayerTextDrawSetString(pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10], ShowMoneyPlus[pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10]], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10], ShowMoneyPlus[pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10]]), SetTimerEx("HideMoneyTD", 4500, false, "i", pInfo[playerid][aSpam][10]),
            else mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `players` SET `Business` = 355, `Money` = `Money`+%d WHERE `user` = '%s'", Business[h][BPrice], Business[h][Owner]), mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
            
            switch(Business[h][Type])
            {
                case 0: pInfo[playerid][pBusiness] = h, GiveMoney(playerid, -Business[h][BPrice]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][63] = h,
                    format(Business[h][Owner], MAX_PLAYER_NAME, "%s", pInfo[playerid][pUser]), Business[h][BPrice] = 0,
                    SetPlayerInteriorEx(playerid, Business[h][Interior]), SetPlayerVirtualWorldEx(playerid, Business[h][VW]),
                    SetPlayerPos(playerid, Business[h][IntX], Business[h][IntY], Business[h][IntZ]),
                    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Congratulations, you've buy a new business!\nType ~g~/help ~w~to review the new property help section!", 4000, 3),
                    HBRefresh(2, h), orm_update(Business[h][ORM_ID]);

                case 1: pInfo[playerid][pBusiness] = h, GiveMoney(playerid, -Business[h][BPrice]), Business[h][BPrice] = 0,
                    format(Business[h][Owner], MAX_PLAYER_NAME, "%s", pInfo[playerid][pUser]),
                    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Congratulations, you've buy a new business!\nType ~g~/help ~w~to review the new property help section!", 4000, 3),
                    HBRefresh(2, h), orm_update(Business[h][ORM_ID]);
            }
            mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `players` SET `Business`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d", pInfo[playerid][pBusiness],pInfo[playerid][pID]);
            mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
            return 1;
        }
        else
        {
            if(strcmp(Business[h][Owner], "TheState", false)) return 1;
            if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < Business[h][Value]) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
            format(stmsg[playerid], 120, "Buying business ID %d for %s$ from Anyone (TheState).", h+1, FormatNumber(Business[h][Value])), addlog(stmsg[playerid], playerid, 2);
            switch(Business[h][Type])
            {
                case 0: pInfo[playerid][pBusiness] = h, GiveMoney(playerid, -Business[h][Value]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][63] = h,
                    format(Business[h][Owner], MAX_PLAYER_NAME, "%s", pInfo[playerid][pUser]),
                    SetPlayerInteriorEx(playerid, Business[h][Interior]), SetPlayerVirtualWorldEx(playerid, Business[h][VW]),
                    SetPlayerPos(playerid, Business[h][IntX], Business[h][IntY], Business[h][IntZ]),
                    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Congratulations, you've buy a new business!\nType ~g~/help ~w~to review the new property help section!", 4000, 3),
                    HBRefresh(2, h), orm_update(Business[h][ORM_ID]);
                
                case 1: pInfo[playerid][pBusiness] = h, GiveMoney(playerid, -Business[h][Value]),
                    format(Business[h][Owner], MAX_PLAYER_NAME, "%s", pInfo[playerid][pUser]),
                    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Congratulations, you've buy a new business!\nType ~g~/help ~w~to review the new property help section!", 4000, 3),
                    HBRefresh(2, h), orm_update(Business[h][ORM_ID]);
            }
            mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `players` SET `Business`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d", pInfo[playerid][pBusiness],pInfo[playerid][pID]);
            mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

CMD:rentroom(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pHouse] != -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You already own a house or rented a room.");
    for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(Houses); i++) if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.5, Houses[i][EnterX], Houses[i][EnterY], Houses[i][EnterZ]))
    {
        if(!strcmp(Houses[i][Owner], "TheState", false)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "The house is not bought.");
        if(Houses[i][Rentabil] < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "This house is not rentable.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][pHouse] != -1 && strcmp(pInfo[playerid][pUser], Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][Owner], true) == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You already own a house.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < Houses[i][RentPrice]) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
        pInfo[playerid][pHouse] = i, pInfo[playerid][aVar][61] = i, GiveMoney(playerid, -Houses[i][RentPrice]);
        SetPlayerInteriorEx(playerid,Houses[i][Interior]), SetPlayerVirtualWorldEx(playerid, Houses[i][VW]);
        SetPlayerPos(playerid, Houses[i][IntX], Houses[i][IntY], Houses[i][IntZ]);
        GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Congratulations, you are now tenant in this house!", 4000, 3);
        mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 200, "UPDATE `players` SET `House`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d", pInfo[playerid][pHouse],pInfo[playerid][pID]);
        mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
        pInfo[playerid][aVar][24] = CreateDynamicMapIcon(Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][EnterX], Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][EnterY], Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][EnterZ], 31, 0, .playerid = playerid);
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "Foloseste comanda (/spawnchange) sa te spawnezi la casa inchiriata.");
        return 1;
    }
    return 1;
}
CMD:unrentroom(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pHouse] == -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You don't rent a house.");
    if(!strcmp(Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][Owner], pInfo[playerid][pUser], false)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You have a house.");
    pInfo[playerid][pHouse] = -1, SetPosIV(playerid), SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "You have terminated the rent contract."), DestroyDynamicMapIcon(pInfo[playerid][aVar][24]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][24] = 0;
    mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 150, "UPDATE `players` SET `House`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d", pInfo[playerid][pHouse],pInfo[playerid][pID]);
    mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
    return 1;
}

CMD:turfs(playerid, params [])
{
    if(Iter_Contains(Warp, playerid) || Iter_Contains(Warp2, playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Do not use this command if you are enrolled in a war.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][5] == 0)
    {
        SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "Turfs ON."), pInfo[playerid][aVar][5] = 1;
        for(new z = 0; z < 450; z++)
        {
            switch(Turfs[z][Owned]) {
                case 9: GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID], 0x009100AA);
                case 10: GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID], 0x910082AA);
                case 11: GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID], 0xF7F791AA);
                case 12: GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID], 0xFF7F00AA);
                case 14: GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID], 0xAA8064AA); }
            if(!Turfs[z][zexist]) continue;
            GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][0],0x00000060), GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][1],0x00000060),
            GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][2],0x00000060), GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][3],0x00000060);
            for(new nump; nump < 5; nump++)
            {
                if(Turfs[z][npart][nump] != -1) GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][npart][nump],0x00000080);
                if(Turfs[z][npart2][nump] != -1) GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][npart2][nump],0x00000080);
            }
        }
        return 1;
    }
    SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "Turfs OFF."), pInfo[playerid][aVar][5] = 0;
    for(new z = 0; z < 450; z++)
    {
        GangZoneHideForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID]);
        if(!Turfs[z][zexist]) continue;
        GangZoneHideForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][0]), GangZoneHideForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][1]),
        GangZoneHideForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][2]), GangZoneHideForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][3]);
        for(new nump;nump<5;nump++)
        {
            if(Turfs[z][npart][nump] != -1) GangZoneHideForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][npart][nump]);
            if(Turfs[z][npart2][nump] != -1) GangZoneHideForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][npart2][nump]);
        }
    }
    return 1;
}
CMD:top(playerid, params[])
{
    new Turfss[5];
    SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "|______ Top Gangs ______|");
    for(new h = 0; h < sizeof(Turfs); h++)
    {
        switch(Turfs[h][Owned]) {
            case 9: Turfss[0]++;
            case 10: Turfss[1]++;
            case 11: Turfss[2]++;
            case 12: Turfss[3]++; }
    }
    format(stmsg[playerid], 56, "Grove Street{FFFFFF} - {009100}%d Territories.", Turfss[0]), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_GROVE, stmsg[playerid]);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 56, "The Ballas Family{FFFFFF} - {910082}%d Territories.", Turfss[1]), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_BALLAS, stmsg[playerid]);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 56, "Los Santos Vagos{FFFFFF} - {F7F791}%d Territories.", Turfss[2]), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_VAGOS, stmsg[playerid]);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 56, "La Cosa Nostra{FFFFFF} - {FF7F00}%d Territories.", Turfss[3]), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_RUSSIAN, stmsg[playerid]);
    SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "|_______________________|");
    return 1;
}
CMD:topgangs(playerid, params[]) return cmd_top(playerid, params);

CMD:stopanim(playerid, params[])
{
    pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] = GetPlayerAnimationIndex(playerid);
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] == 1128 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] == 1129 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] == 1130 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] == 1131 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] == 1132 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] == 1133 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] == 1134 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][43] != -1) return 1;
    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid) || pInfo[playerid][pSleep] == 1 || CP[playerid] == 90) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't use this command.");
    ClearAnimations(playerid), SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, 0);
    return 1;
}

CMD:invite(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pRank] < 6 || pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 13) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a leader.");

    if(sscanf(params, "u", playerto)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/invite [playerid/name]");
    if(playerto == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[playerto][pStatus] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY,"Player not connected.");
    if(pInfo[playerto][pFPunish] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY,"The player has fpunish.");

    return 1;
}

CMD:setmotd(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pRank] < 10 || pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 13) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a leader.");
    new string[130], motd[128];
    if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", motd)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/setmotd [MOTD Text]");
    if(strlen(motd) > 90) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Maximum characters allowed for faction MOTD is 90.");
    if(!IsValidMOTD(motd)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Invalid characters, valid characters are: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, (. , : ! ?).");
    mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 290, "UPDATE `fmotd` SET `Text` = '%s' WHERE `fID` = %d", motd, pInfo[playerid][pMember]);
    mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
    format(string, sizeof(string), "New faction MOTD: {FFFFFF}%s", motd);
    switch(pInfo[playerid][pMember])
    {
        case 1: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_LSPD, string);
        case 2: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_FBI, string);
        case 3: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_NG, string);
        case 4: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_PARAMEDICS, string);
        case 5: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_TAXI, string);
        case 6: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_NEWSREPORTER, string);
        case 7: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_SCINSTRUCTOR, string);
        case 8: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_HITMAN, string);
        case 9: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_GROVE, string);
        case 10: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_BALLAS, string);
        case 11: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_VAGOS, string);
        case 12: SendTeamMessage(pInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_RUSSIAN, string);
    }
    return 1;
}

CMD:quitclan(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pClan] == -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You're not part of a clan.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pCRank] == 7) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "A leader can't leave the clan.");

    pInfo[playerid][pClan] = -1, pInfo[playerid][pCRank] = 0, SetPlayerName(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pUser]), format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "%s", GetName(playerid)), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, NamePlayer[playerid], SpStr), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, NamePlayer[playerid]);
    return 1;
}

CMD:c(playerid, params [])

    if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", params)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/c [clan chat]");
    switch(pInfo[playerid][pCRank])
    {
        case 7: format(stmsg[playerid], 169, "{%s}(%d) %s %s: %s", Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Color], pInfo[playerid][pCRank], Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Rank7], GetName(playerid), params);

        case 5: format(stmsg[playerid], 169, "{%s}(%d) %s %s: %s", Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Color], pInfo[playerid][pCRank], Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Rank5], GetName(playerid), params);
        case 4: format(stmsg[playerid], 169, "{%s}(%d) %s %s: %s", Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Color], pInfo[playerid][pCRank], Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Rank4], GetName(playerid), params);
        case 3: format(stmsg[playerid], 169, "{%s}(%d) %s %s: %s", Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Color], pInfo[playerid][pCRank], Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Rank3], GetName(playerid), params);

CMD:tag(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pClan] == -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You're not part of a clan.");
    if(sscanf(params, "s[8]", params)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/tag [put / remove]");
    if(strcmp(params,"put",true) == 0)
    {
        new PutTag[30];

        format(stmsg[playerid], 10, "[%s]", Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Tag]);
        if(strfind(GetName(playerid), stmsg[playerid], true) != -1) return 1;
        if(Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Type] == 2 ? format(stmsg[playerid], 34, "(%s)%s", Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Tag], pInfo[playerid][pUser]) : format(stmsg[playerid], 34, "%s(%s)", pInfo[playerid][pUser], Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Tag]))
        PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, NamePlayer[playerid], stmsg[playerid]);
        switch(Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Type])
        {
            case 1: format(PutTag, sizeof(PutTag), "%s[%s]",pInfo[playerid][pUser], Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Tag]), SetPlayerName(playerid, PutTag);
            case 2: format(PutTag, sizeof(PutTag), "[%s]%s", Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Tag], pInfo[playerid][pUser]), SetPlayerName(playerid, PutTag);
        }
        return 1;
    }
    if(strcmp(params,"remove",true) == 0)
	{
 		format(SpStr, sizeof(SpStr), "%s", pInfo[playerid][pUser]), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, NamePlayer[playerid], SpStr);
		SetPlayerName(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pUser]);//, PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, NamePlayer[playerid]);
	}
	//return SetPlayerName(playerid, pInfo[playerid][pUser]), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, NamePlayer[playerid], GetName(playerid));
    return 1;
}

CMD:spray(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pClan] == -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You're not part of a clan.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pCRank] < 3) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You not have minimum rank 3.");
    if(GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) != 41) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You don't have a Spray in hand.");
    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't use this command from inside a vehicle.");
    if(vwp[playerid] != 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You're not in Virtual-World 0.");
    pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] = 0;
    for(new h = 0; h < sizeof(CWar); h++) if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2.8, CWar[h][Posw][0], CWar[h][Posw][1], CWar[h][Posw][2]))
    {
        if(CWar[h][ClanOwn] == pInfo[playerid][pClan]) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can not spray your own wall.");
        if(CWar[h][NAttack] > gtm) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "This wall can not be sprayed at this time.");
        if(CWar[h][AttOn] == 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "A wall already spraying.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][111] < gtm) pInfo[playerid][aVar][112] = 0, pInfo[playerid][aVar][43] = -1;
        ApplyAnimation(playerid,"SPRAYCAN","spraycan_full",4.1,1,0,1,0,0);
        switch(pInfo[playerid][aVar][112])
        {
            case 0:
            {
                GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~w~spraying...~n~1/10", 10000, 3), pInfo[playerid][aVar][43] = h;
                format(stmsg[playerid], 189, "((Clan War)): %s a inceput sa spray-eze pe peretele #%d detinut de Clanul {%s}%s{77D45F}.", GetName(playerid), h+1, Clan[CWar[h][ClanOwn]][Color], Clan[CWar[h][ClanOwn]][Name]), SendClanMessage(pInfo[playerid][pClan], 0x77D45FFF, stmsg[playerid]);
                format(stmsg[playerid], 210, "((Clan War)): Clanul {%s}%s {77D45F}a inceput sa spray-eze peretele #%d detinut de Clanul tau, mergi si omoara adversarul care spray-aza peretele. (/walls)", Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Color], Clan[pInfo[playerid][pClan]][Name], h+1), SendClanMessage(CWar[h][ClanOwn], 0x77D45FFF, stmsg[playerid]);
            }
            case 1: GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~w~spraying...~n~2/10", 10000, 3);
            case 2: GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~w~spraying...~n~3/10", 10000, 3);
            case 3: GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~w~spraying...~n~4/10", 10000, 3);
            case 4: GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~w~spraying...~n~5/10", 10000, 3);
            case 5: GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~w~spraying...~n~6/10", 10000, 3);
            case 6: GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~w~spraying...~n~7/10", 10000, 3);
            case 7: GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~w~spraying...~n~8/10", 10000, 3);
            case 8: GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~w~spraying...~n~9/10", 10000, 3);
            case 9: GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~w~spraying...~n~10/10", 10000, 3);
        }
        pInfo[playerid][aVar][25] = SetTimerEx("GeneralTimer", 10000, false, "ii", playerid, 29), pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] = 1, pInfo[playerid][aVar][111] = gtm+120, CWar[h][AttOn] = 1;
        return 1;
    }
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not at the any walls for spraying, use /walls.");
    return 1;
}

CMD:safe(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a faction member.");
    if(!((IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2.0, 2456.3105,-1672.2173,13.5015) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 9) || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2.0, 686.7648,-1261.1740,13.5572) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 10)

    || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.0, 2169.7498,1624.5067,999.9728) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 8) || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.0, 1743.3771,-2014.3970,20.6425) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 5) || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.0, 355.1122,169.9077,1025.7891) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 4)
    || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1.7, 1733.5786,-1650.0779,20.2343) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 6) || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2.5, 872.6083,-1617.8590,40.0807) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 7) || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2.5, 366.4722,159.6542,1008.3828) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 13)
    || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.5, 244.5091,1859.8794,14.0840) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 3) || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.5, 267.9845,185.8792,1008.1719) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2) || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.5, 217.0888,77.0297,1005.0391) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1))) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not at faction safe.");
    if(sscanf(params,"s[17]", params)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/safe [password]");
    switch(pInfo[playerid][pMember])
    {
        case 1:
        {
            if(strcmp(params, Safes[1][Password], false)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Wrong password, try again.");

            Safes[1][SafeLastLog] = GetName(playerid), orm_update(Safes[1][ORM_ID]), SafeRefresh(1);
        }
        case 2:
        {
            if(strcmp(params, Safes[2][Password], false)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Wrong password, try again.");
            ShowPlayerDialog(playerid, DIALOG_SAFESFACT, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Faction Safe", "1. Drugs\r\n2. Materials\r\n3. Money\r\n4. Weapons\r\n5. Change Password (Only Leader)", "Select", "Exit");
            SendClientMessage(playerid, 0x1591ADFF, "You have successfully logged in.");
            Safes[2][SafeLastLog] = GetName(playerid), orm_update(Safes[2][ORM_ID]), SafeRefresh(2);
        }
        case 3:

CMD:frisktrunk(playerid, params[])
{
    if(!IsACop(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not part of a team.");
    if(CopDuty[playerid] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "(Duty): Nu esti la datorie, tasteaza '/duty' in HQ.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pRank] < 5) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You not have minimum rank 5.");
    new veh;
    if(sscanf(params, "d", veh)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/frisktrunk [vehicle ID]");
    if(!IsValidVehicle(veh)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Invalid vehicle ID.");
    if(vVar[1][veh] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Vehicle is not private.");
    foreach(new i : Player) if(pInfo[i][pTotVeh] != -1)
    {
        for(new ri = 0; ri < 15; ri++) if(Veh[i][ri][ServerID] == veh)
        {
            new gunname[32], gunname2[32];
            format(stmsg[playerid], 40,"*** %s Trunk ***", g_VehicleNames[Veh[i][ri][Model]-400]), SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, stmsg[playerid]);
            GetWeaponName(Veh[i][ri][vWE][0], gunname, sizeof(gunname)), GetWeaponName(Veh[i][ri][vWE][1], gunname2, sizeof(gunname2));
            format(stmsg[playerid], 140, "Money: {828282}%s$ {FFFFFF}| Materials: {828282}%s {FFFFFF}| Drugs: {828282}%s grams.", FormatNumber(Veh[i][ri][vMoney]), FormatNumber(Veh[i][ri][vMats]), FormatNumber(Veh[i][ri][vDrugs])), SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, stmsg[playerid]),
            format(stmsg[playerid], 130, "Weapon 1: {828282}%s, %s bullets {FFFFFF}| Weapon 2: {828282}%s, %s bullets.", Veh[i][ri][vAM][0] == 0 ? ("No") : (gunname), FormatNumber(Veh[i][ri][vAM][0]), Veh[i][ri][vAM][1] == 0 ? ("No") : (gunname2), FormatNumber(Veh[i][ri][vAM][1])),
            SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, stmsg[playerid]);
            format(MStH, sizeof(MStH), "* %s has frisked %s trunk for any illegal items.", GetName(playerid), g_VehicleNames[Veh[i][ri][Model]-400]);
            SendAreaMessage(30.0, playerid, MStH, COLOR_PURPLE);
            return 1;
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

CMD:cutvein(playerid, params [])
{
    if(!IsAMember(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a Gang Member.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pRank] < 3) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You need rank 3 or higher to cut veins.");
    new playerto;
    if(sscanf(params, "u", playerto)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/cutvein [playerid/name]");
    if(playerto == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[playerto][pStatus] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY,"Player not connected.");
    if(GetPVarInt(playerto, "Tied") == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "The player not tied.");
    if(!ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, playerto)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player not near you.");
    if(playerto == playerid) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You cannot cut veins yourself.");
    if(!(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid) && IsPlayerInVehicle(playerto, GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)))) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player not in your car.");
    format(MStH, sizeof(MStH), "* %s cut his veins %s.", GetName(playerid), GetName(playerto)), SendAreaMessage(20.0, playerid, MStH, COLOR_PURPLE);
    GetPlayerHealth(playerto, health), SetPlayerHealth(playerto, health-30);
    return 1;
}

CMD:leavewar(playerid, params [])
{
    if(!IsAMember(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a Gang Member.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pJailed] > 0 || pInfo[playerid][pAJailed] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Do not use this command if you are in jail.");
    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can not use this command in a vehicle.");
    if(!Iter_Contains(Warp, playerid) && !Iter_Contains(Warp2, playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not enrolled in the war.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][55] < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can not left the war with 0 kills.");

    PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, WarYKills[playerid]), PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, WarYKills[playerid], "Your Kills: ~p~0 kills");
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][87] == 5 || pInfo[playerid][aVar][54] > 0) TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[0]), TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[1]), TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[2]), TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[3]), TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[4]), GangZoneStopFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[WarNR-1][tID]), Iter_Remove(Warp, playerid);
    else TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,War2TD[0]), TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,War2TD[1]), TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,War2TD[2]), TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,War2TD[3]), TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,War2TD[4]), GangZoneStopFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[War2NR-1][tID]), Iter_Remove(Warp2, playerid);

CMD:joinwar(playerid, params [])
{
    if(!IsAMember(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a Gang Member.");
    if(WarOnOff == 0 && War2OnOff == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "War is not started.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] != Attack && pInfo[playerid][pMember] != Defend && pInfo[playerid][pMember] != Attack2 && pInfo[playerid][pMember] != Defend2) return 1;
    if(pInfo[playerid][pJailed] > 0 || pInfo[playerid][pAJailed] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Do not use this command if you are in jail.");
    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can not use this command in a vehicle.");
    if(Iter_Contains(Warp, playerid) || Iter_Contains(Warp2, playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are already enrolled in the war.");
    if(Iter_Contains(Train[pInfo[playerid][pMember]], playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can not use this command in training room.");
    switch(WType)
    {
        case 1:
        {
            if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][5] == 0)
            {
                pInfo[playerid][aVar][5] = 1;
                for(new z = 0; z < 450; z++)
                {
                    switch(Turfs[z][Owned]) {
                        case 9: GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID], 0x009100AA);
                        case 10: GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID], 0x910082AA);
                        case 11: GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID], 0xF7F791AA);
                        case 12: GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID], 0xFF7F00AA);
                        case 14: GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[z][tID], 0xAA8064AA); }
                    if(!Turfs[z][zexist]) continue;
                    GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][0],0x00000060), GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][1],0x00000060),
                    GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][2],0x00000060), GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][border][3],0x00000060);
                    for(new nump; nump < 5; nump++)
                    {
                        if(Turfs[z][npart][nump] != -1) GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][npart][nump],0x00000080);
                        if(Turfs[z][npart2][nump] != -1) GangZoneShowForPlayer(playerid,Turfs[z][npart2][nump],0x00000080);
                    }
                }
            }
            if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] == Attack || pInfo[playerid][pMember] == Defend)
            {
                pInfo[playerid][aVar][87] = 5, GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 24, 100), GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 30, 300), pInfo[playerid][aVar][79] = 0, pInfo[playerid][aVar][55] = 0,
                SpawnPlayer(playerid), Iter_Add(Warp, playerid), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[0]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[1]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[2]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[3]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[4]), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, WarYKills[playerid]);
                switch(Attack) {
                    case 9: GangZoneFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[WarNR-1][tID], 0x009100AA);
                    case 10: GangZoneFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[WarNR-1][tID], 0x910082AA);
                    case 11: GangZoneFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[WarNR-1][tID], 0xF7F791AA);
                    case 12: GangZoneFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[WarNR-1][tID], 0xFF7F00AA);
                    case 14: GangZoneFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[WarNR-1][tID], 0xAA8064AA); }
                return 1;
            }
            pInfo[playerid][aVar][87] = 6, GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 24, 100), GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 30, 300), pInfo[playerid][aVar][79] = 0, pInfo[playerid][aVar][55] = 0,
            SpawnPlayer(playerid), Iter_Add(Warp2, playerid), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,War2TD[0]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,War2TD[1]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,War2TD[2]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,War2TD[3]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,War2TD[4]), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, WarYKills[playerid]);
            switch(Attack) {
                case 9: GangZoneFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[War2NR-1][tID], 0x009100AA);
                case 10: GangZoneFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[War2NR-1][tID], 0x910082AA);
                case 11: GangZoneFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[War2NR-1][tID], 0xF7F791AA);
                case 12: GangZoneFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[War2NR-1][tID], 0xFF7F00AA);
                case 14: GangZoneFlashForPlayer(playerid, Turfs[War2NR-1][tID], 0xAA8064AA); }
            return 1;
        }
        case 2: Iter_Add(Warp, playerid), pInfo[playerid][aVar][54] = 3, GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 24, 100), GivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 30, 300), pInfo[playerid][aVar][79] = 0, pInfo[playerid][aVar][55] = 0,
            TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[0]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[1]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[2]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[3]), TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,WarTD[4]), PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, WarYKills[playerid]), SpawnPlayer(playerid);
    }
    return 1;
}

CMD:cancel(playerid, params[])
{
    if(sscanf(params, "s[15]", params)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/cancel [option]"),
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "OPTIONS: live | gun | license | find | mechanic | materials | drugs | invite | medic | taxi | veh | war | requestlicense | trade | keys | duel");

    if(strcmp(params,"event",true) == 0)
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, AdminError);
        if(TEvent == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "There is no ongoing event at the moment.");
        switch(TEvent)
        {
            case 1: TEvent = 0, format(strAll, sizeof(strAll), "{C22124}(( {F2F2F2}AdmBot: Fast Event was stopped by Admin %s {C22124}))", GetName(playerid)), SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_RED, strAll);
            case 2: TEvent = 0, format(strAll, sizeof(strAll), "{C22124}(( {F2F2F2}AdmBot: Scramble Event was stopped by Admin %s {C22124}))", GetName(playerid)), SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_RED, strAll);
            case 3: TEvent = 0, format(strAll, sizeof(strAll), "{C22124}(( {F2F2F2}AdmBot: Math Event was stopped by Admin %s {C22124}))", GetName(playerid)), SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_RED, strAll);
            case 4: TEvent = 0, format(strAll, sizeof(strAll), "{C22124}(( {F2F2F2}AdmBot: Trivia Event was stopped by Admin %s {C22124}))", GetName(playerid)), SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_RED, strAll);
        }
    }
    if(strcmp(params,"bomb",true) == 0)
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] != 8) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a Hitman Member.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][30] == -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Not any bomb attached.");
        pInfo[playerid][aVar][30] = -1, GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~bomb was canceled", 4000, 3);
    }
    if(strcmp(params,"live",true) == 0)
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][73] == -1 || !IsPlayerConnected(pInfo[playerid][aVar][73])) return 1;
        format(stmsg[playerid], 82, "* You refused the live news conference for %s$ from reporter %s.", FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][aVar][74]), GetName(pInfo[playerid][aVar][73]));
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
        format(stmsg[pInfo[playerid][aVar][73]], 62, "* %s refused your live news conference for %s$.", GetName(playerid), FormatNumber(pInfo[playerid][aVar][74]));
        SendClientMessage(pInfo[playerid][aVar][73], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pInfo[playerid][aVar][73]]);
        pInfo[playerid][aVar][73] = -1, pInfo[playerid][aVar][74] = 0;
    }
    if(strcmp(params,"trade",true) == 0)
    {
        if(pProdOffer[playerid] == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[pProdOffer[playerid]][pStatus] != 1 || pProdType[playerid] != 10 || pProdType[playerid] != 11 || pProdType[playerid] != 12) return 1;
        format(stmsg[playerid], 74, "* You refused %s's trade.", GetName(pProdOffer[playerid])), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
        format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 58, "* %s refused your trade.", GetName(playerid)), SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);
        pProdOffer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pProdType[playerid] = 0;
    }
    if(strcmp(params,"duel",true) == 0)
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][pDuel] == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[pProdOffer[playerid]][pStatus] != 1 || pProdType[playerid] != 18) return 1;
        format(stmsg[playerid], 80, "* You refused %s's duel request.", GetName(pProdOffer[playerid])), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
        format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 80, "* %s refused your duel request.", GetName(playerid)), SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);
        pInfo[playerid][pDuel] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pProdType[playerid] = 0;
    }
    if(strcmp(params,"keys",true) == 0)
    {
        if(pProdOffer[playerid] == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[pProdOffer[playerid]][pStatus] != 1 || pProdType[playerid] != 15) return 1;
        format(stmsg[playerid], 74, "* You refused %s's %s keys.", GetName(pProdOffer[playerid]), g_VehicleNames[Veh[playerid][pProdMoney[playerid]][Model]-400]), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
        format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 60, "* %s refused your %s keys.", GetName(playerid), g_VehicleNames[Veh[playerid][pProdMoney[playerid]][Model]-400]), SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);
        pProdOffer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pProdType[playerid] = 0;
    }
    if(strcmp(params,"license",true) == 0)
    {
        if(pProdOffer[playerid] == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[pProdOffer[playerid]][pStatus] != 1 || pProdType[playerid] != 4) return 1;
        switch(pInfo[playerid][aVar][18]) 
        {
            case 1:
            {
                if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < 4000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta."), pInfo[playerid][aVar][18] = 0;
                format(stmsg[playerid], 74, "* You refused Flying License for 4.000$ from instructor %s.", GetName(pProdOffer[playerid])),
                SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
                format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 58, "* %s refused your Flying License for 4.000$.", GetName(playerid)),
                SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);
            }
            case 2:
            {
                if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < 2000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta."), pInfo[playerid][aVar][18] = 0;
                format(stmsg[playerid], 78, "* You refused Sailing License for 2.000$ from instructor %s.", GetName(pProdOffer[playerid])),
                SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
                format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 62, "* %s refused your Sailing License for 2.000$.", GetName(playerid)),
                SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);
            }
            case 3:
            {
                if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < 5000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta."), pInfo[playerid][aVar][18] = 0;
                format(stmsg[playerid], 74, "* You refused Weapon License for 5.000$ from instructor %s.", GetName(pProdOffer[playerid])),
                SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
                format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 62, "* %s refused your Weapon License for 5.000$.", GetName(playerid)),
                SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);
            }
        }
        pProdOffer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pProdType[playerid] = 0;
    }
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][7] != 0 && strcmp(params,"invite",true) == 0) pInfo[playerid][aVar][7] = 0, GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~n~~w~declined invitation in faction", 4000, 3);
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][32] != 0 && strcmp(params,"taxi",true) == 0) pInfo[playerid][aVar][32] = 0, SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, "* Ai anulat serviciul de taxi.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][31] != 0 && strcmp(params,"medic",true) == 0) pInfo[playerid][aVar][31] = 0, SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, "* Ai anulat serviciul de paramedici.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][77] != 0 && strcmp(params,"requestlicense",true) == 0) pInfo[playerid][aVar][77] = 0, SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, "* Ai anulat solicitarea de licente.");
    if(strcmp(params,"war",true) == 0 && pProdType[playerid] == 8)
    {
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, "* You refused the war invitation."), SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, "* The invitation sent by you to war was refused.");
        pProdOffer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pProdMoney[playerid] = 0, pProdInfo[playerid] = 0, pProdType[playerid] = 0;
    }
    if(FindP[playerid] > -1 && strcmp(params,"find",true) == 0) DisablePlayerCheckpoint(playerid), FindP[playerid] = -1, PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, FindTD[playerid]),
        GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~r~canceled find", 3000, 5);
    else if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][99] != 0 && strcmp(params,"mechanic",true) == 0) pInfo[playerid][aVar][99] = 0, SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Apelul catre serviciul de mecanici a fost anulat.");
    else if(strcmp(params,"materials",true) == 0)
    {
        if(pProdOffer[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && pProdType[playerid] == 1 && IsPlayerConnected(pProdOffer[playerid]))
        {
            format(stmsg[playerid], 78, "* You refused %s materials for %s$ from %s.", FormatNumber(pProdInfo[playerid]), FormatNumber(pProdMoney[playerid]), GetName(pProdOffer[playerid]));
            SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
            format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 68, "* %s refused your %s materials for %s$.", GetName(playerid), FormatNumber(pProdInfo[playerid]), FormatNumber(pProdMoney[playerid]));
            SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);
            pProdOffer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pProdMoney[playerid] = 0, pProdInfo[playerid] = 0, pProdType[playerid] = 0;
        }
    }
    else if(strcmp(params,"drugs",true) == 0)
    {
        if(pProdOffer[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && pProdType[playerid] == 2 && IsPlayerConnected(pProdOffer[playerid]))
        {
            format(stmsg[playerid], 78, "* You refused %s grams of drugs for %s$ from %s.", FormatNumber(pProdInfo[playerid]), FormatNumber(pProdMoney[playerid]), GetName(pProdOffer[playerid]));
            SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
            format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 70, "* %s refused your %s grams of drugs for %s$.", GetName(playerid), FormatNumber(pProdInfo[playerid]), FormatNumber(pProdMoney[playerid]));
            SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);
            pProdOffer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pProdMoney[playerid] = 0, pProdInfo[playerid] = 0, pProdType[playerid] = 0;
        }
    }
    else if(strcmp(params,"veh",true) == 0)
    {
        if(pProdOffer[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && pProdType[playerid] == 7 && IsPlayerConnected(pProdOffer[playerid]))
        {
            format(stmsg[playerid], 98, "* You refused vehicle %s for %s$ from %s.", g_VehicleNames[pProdInfo[playerid]-400], FormatNumber(pProdMoney[playerid]), GetName(pProdOffer[playerid]));
            SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
            format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 98, "* %s refused your vehicle %s for %s$.", GetName(playerid), g_VehicleNames[pProdInfo[playerid]-400], FormatNumber(pProdMoney[playerid]));
            SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);
            pProdOffer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pProdMoney[playerid] = 0, pProdInfo[playerid] = 0, pProdType[playerid] = 0;
        }
    }
    else if(strcmp(params,"gun",true) == 0)
    {
        new gname[14];
        if(pProdOffer[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && pProdType[playerid] == 6 && IsPlayerConnected(pProdOffer[playerid]))
        {
            switch(pProdInfo[playerid])
            {
                case 1: gname = "Desert Eagle";
                case 2: gname = "Pistol 9mm";
                case 3: gname = "Micro SMG/Uzi";
                case 4: gname = "MP5";
                case 5: gname = "AK-47";
                case 6: gname = "Shotgun";
                case 7: gname = "Silenced 9mm";
                case 8: gname = "M4";
            }
            format(stmsg[playerid], 64, "* You refused a %s for %s$ from %s.", gname, FormatNumber(pProdMoney[playerid]), GetName(pProdOffer[playerid])),
            SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
            format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 64, "* %s refused your %s for %s$.", GetName(playerid), gname, FormatNumber(pProdMoney[playerid])),
            SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);
            pProdOffer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pProdMoney[playerid] = 0, pProdInfo[playerid] = 0, pProdType[playerid] = 0;
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

CMD:service(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pJailed] > 0 || pInfo[playerid][pAJailed] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Do not use this command if you are in jail.");
    if(sscanf(params, "s[10]", params)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/service [mechanic / taxi / medic]");
    if(!strcmp(params, "mechanic", true))
    {
        if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu esti intr-un vehicul.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][99] != 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Ai apelat deja la serviciul de mecanici.");
        GetVehicleParamsEx(pInfo[playerid][aVar][1], vParams[0], vParams[1], vParams[2], vParams[3], vParams[4], vParams[5], vParams[6]);
        if(vParams[0] != 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Inainte de a chema un mecanic opreste motorul.");
        switch(pInfo[playerid][pScore])
        {
            case 1..19: ShowPlayerDialog(playerid, DIALOG_SMECHANIC, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Service Mechanic", "Refill - 25.000$/20 liters\nRepair - 5.000$", "Select", "Back");
            default: ShowPlayerDialog(playerid, DIALOG_SMECHANIC, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Service Mechanic", "Refill - 28.000$/20 liters\nRepair - 8.000$", "Select", "Back");
        }
    }
    if(!strcmp(params, "taxi", true))
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 5) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Esti taximetrist, nu poti apela la un serviciu de taxi.");
        if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not use that command, you are in a vehicle.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][32] != 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Ai apelat deja la serviciul de taxi.");
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "* Ai apelat la un serviciu de taxi, asteapta ca un taximetrist sa-ti accepte apelul.");
        pInfo[playerid][aVar][32] = 1;
        format(stmsg[playerid], 90, "* %s are nevoie de un taxi, foloseste /calls si accepta-i apelul.", GetName(playerid));
        SendTeamMessage(5, COLOR_TAXI, stmsg[playerid]);
    }
    if(!strcmp(params, "medic", true))
    {
        if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 4) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Esti medic, nu poti apela la un serviciu de medici.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][31] != 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Ai apelat deja la serviciul de paramedici.");
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "* Ai apelat la un serviciu de paramedici, asteapta ca un paramedic sa-ti accepte apelul.");
        pInfo[playerid][aVar][31] = 1;
        format(stmsg[playerid], 90, "* %s are nevoie de un paramedic, foloseste /calls si accepta-i apelul.", GetName(playerid));
        SendTeamMessage(4, COLOR_PARAMEDICS, stmsg[playerid]);
    }
    return 1;
}

CMD:trade(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pScore] < 4) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You need at least level 4.");
    ShowPlayerDialog(playerid, DIALOG_TRADE, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Trade Options", "Business\nHouse\nVehicle", "Select", "Close");

CMD:requestlicense(playerid, params[])

    return 1;
}

CMD:spin(playerid, params[])
{
    if(!(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.5, 830.8712,-2047.8138,12.8672))) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "* Nu te afli langa spin gift. (/gps -> Spin Gift)");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pSpinGift] < 1) return format(stmsg[playerid], 100, "Nu ai nici-un payday acumulat, asteapta payday-ul!"), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, stmsg[playerid]);
	switch(SpinUtilizat)
	{
	    case 1: SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "{C9B24B}Spin-ul este utilizat, asteapta.");
	    case 0:
	    {
	        pInfo[playerid][pSpinGift] -= 1, PremiuSpin[playerid] = 100;
		    MoveObject(NeonMove,831.1341, -2055.0566, 11.1962,5.0);
		    SetTimerEx("MoveNeon", 2000, false, "i", playerid);
		    SpinUtilizat = 1,format(MStH, sizeof(MStH), "* %s a accesat spin gift-ul.", GetName(playerid)), SendAreaMessage(25.0, playerid, MStH, COLOR_PURPLE);
		}
		case 99:    SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "{C9B24B}Spin Gift-ul este dezactivat.");
	}
 	return 1;
}

	new id;

CMD:detectgold(playerid, params[])
{
	if(SpecialQuestActiv == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "(GoldQuest): Quest-ul special nu este activat.");
	if(pInfo[playerid][pDetectorQuest] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "(Eroare): Nu detii un detector de quest, achizitioneaza-l dintr-un magazin 24/7.");
	switch(pInfo[playerid][pDetectorQuest])
	{
 		case 1:
	    {
     		pInfo[playerid][pDetectorQuest] = 2;
	        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "(GoldQuest): Ai dezactivat gold detector-ul.");

	    }
	    case 2:
	    {
	        pInfo[playerid][pDetectorQuest] = 1;

	}
    return 1;
}

CMD:leaveevent(playerid, params[])

    {
        if (!Event_Joinable)
            return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "There is not any event on going.");

        if (!pInfo[playerid][pEventJoined])
            return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You didn't join any event.");
        ClearAnimations(playerid), SpawnPlayer(playerid);
        pInfo[playerid][pEventJoined] = false, SetPColor(playerid);
        SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xA2E261FF, "[EVENT]: You have left the event !");
    }
    return 1;
}

    return 1;
}
stock SetPlayerMarkerVisibility(playerid, alpha = 0xFF)
{
    new oldcolor, newcolor;
 
    alpha = clamp(alpha, 0x00, 0xFF); // if an out-of-range value is supplied we'll fix it here first
    oldcolor = GetPlayerColor(playerid); // get their color - Note: SetPlayerColor must have been used beforehand
 
    newcolor = (oldcolor & ~0xFF) | alpha; // first we strip of all alpha data (& ~0xFF) and then we replace it with our desired value (| alpha)
    return SetPlayerColor(playerid, newcolor); // returns 1 if it succeeded, 0 otherwise
}

CMD:accept(playerid, params[])
{
    if(sscanf(params, "s[11]", params)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/accept [option]"),
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "OPTIONS: ticket | gun | drugs | materials | live | license | invite | heal | veh | cinvite | war | dice | trade | refill | repair | keys | injections");

    if(!strcmp(params, "keys", true))
    {
        if(pProdOffer[playerid] == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pProdType[playerid] != 15 || pInfo[pProdOffer[playerid]][pStatus] != 1) return 1;

            SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]),
                format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 140, "* %s accepted your %s keys, i've given the keys for %d minutes.", GetName(playerid), g_VehicleNames[Veh[pProdOffer[playerid]][pProdMoney[playerid]][Model]-400], pProdInfo[playerid]),
                    SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][113] = gtm+(pProdInfo[playerid]*60))
        : (format(stmsg[playerid], 90, "* You accepted %s's %s keys.", GetName(pProdOffer[playerid]), g_VehicleNames[Veh[pProdOffer[playerid]][pProdMoney[playerid]][Model]-400]),
            SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][113] = 0,
                format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 80, "* %s accepted your %s keys.", GetName(playerid), g_VehicleNames[Veh[pProdOffer[playerid]][pProdMoney[playerid]][Model]-400]),
                    SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]])))

        pInfo[playerid][aVar][109] = pProdOffer[playerid], pInfo[playerid][aVar][110] = pProdMoney[playerid];
        pProdOffer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID, pProdType[playerid] = 0;
    }
    else if(!strcmp(params, "injections", true))
    {
        if(pProdOffer[playerid] == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pProdType[playerid] != 16 || pInfo[pProdOffer[playerid]][pStatus] != 1) return 1;
        if(!ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, pProdOffer[playerid])) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player not near you.");
        if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < pProdMoney[playerid]) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
        if(pInfo[pProdOffer[playerid]][pInj] < pProdInfo[playerid]) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player don't have enough injections.");
        format(stmsg[playerid], 90, "* You bought a %d injections for %s$ from paramedic %s.", pProdInfo[playerid], FormatNumber(pProdMoney[playerid]), GetName(pProdOffer[playerid]));
        SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
        format(stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]], 80, "* %s bought your %d injections for %s$.", GetName(playerid), pProdInfo[playerid], FormatNumber(pProdMoney[playerid]));
        SendClientMessage(pProdOffer[playerid], COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[pProdOffer[playerid]]);

CMD:quitjob(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pJob] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Tu nu ai nici-un job.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pJob] == 8)  {
    	DestroyJobDrugs(playerid);
    	SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "(Job): Colectarea drogurilor a esuat deoarece ai demisionat de la locul de munca.");
	}
    pInfo[playerid][pJob] = 0, SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Ai demisionat de la locul de munca."),
    DisablePlayerCheckpoint(playerid), FindP[playerid] = -1, PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, FindTD[playerid]), CP[playerid] = 0, pInfo[playerid][pFC] = 0;
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][72] != -1)
    {
        DestroyVehicle(pInfo[playerid][aVar][72]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][72] = -1;
        DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid), DisablePlayerCheckpoint(playerid), CP[playerid] = 0, pInfo[playerid][aVar][21] = 10, pInfo[playerid][aVar][20] = 0, PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobTxt[playerid]);
        KillTimer(pInfo[playerid][aVar][25]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][25] = -1, DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, pInfo[playerid][aVar][33]);
    }
    return 1;
}

CMD:contract(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 8) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Hitman can not place contracts.");
    new id, amount, string[102];
    if(sscanf(params, "ui", id, amount)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/contract [playerid/name] [amount]");
    if(playerid == id) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't place contract yourself.");
    if(!IsPlayerConnected(id)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player not connected.");
    if(pInfo[id][pMember] == 8) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't place contracts on hitman.");
    if(amount < 6000 || amount > 1000000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Contract money can't be below 6.000$ or higher than 1.000.000$.");
    if(pInfo[id][aVar][23] + amount > 600000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "That hit is too high for this player, please lower it.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMoney] < amount) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu ai suma Suficienta.");
    pInfo[id][aVar][23] += amount, GiveMoney(playerid, -amount);
    mysql_format(MySQLCon, quMYSQL, 200, "UPDATE `players` SET `Contract`=%d WHERE `ID`=%d", pInfo[id][aVar][23], pInfo[id][pID]), mysql_tquery(MySQLCon, quMYSQL);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 90, "* You have placed a hit of %s$ on %s.", FormatNumber(amount), GetName(id)), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, stmsg[playerid]);
    format(string, sizeof(string), "HITMAN: A new hit is available. Name: %s | Amount: %s$, (/hits).", GetName(id), FormatNumber(pInfo[id][aVar][23]));
    SendTeamMessage(8, COLOR_HITMAN, string);
    return 1; 
}

CMD:hits(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] != 8) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a Hitman Member.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][89] != -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You already selected a hit. (/leavehit)");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pJailed] > 0 || pInfo[playerid][pAJailed] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Do not use this command if you are in jail.");
    new Float:Pos[3];
    pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] = 0;
    foreach(new i : Player) if(pInfo[i][aVar][23] > 0 && pInfo[i][aVar][65] == 0 && !IsPlayerAfk(i)) return
        GetPlayerPos(i, Pos[0], Pos[1], Pos[2]), SetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, Pos[0], Pos[1], Pos[2], 4.0),
        FindP[playerid] = i, PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, FindTD[playerid]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][58] = 6, pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] = 1, pInfo[i][aVar][65] = 1,
        format(stmsg[playerid], 100, "HITMAN: Name: %s | Amount: %s$ | Distance: %0.2fm.", GetName(i), FormatNumber(pInfo[i][aVar][23]), GetPlayerDistanceFromPoint(playerid, Pos[0], Pos[1], Pos[2])), SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, stmsg[playerid]), pInfo[playerid][aVar][89] = i, 1;

    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][88] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Nu sunt contracte disponibile in acest moment.");
    return 1; 
}
CMD:gethit(playerid, params[]) return cmd_hits(playerid, params);

    SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "HITMAN: You left the hit."), DisablePlayerCheckpoint(playerid), FindP[playerid] = -1, PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, FindTD[playerid]);

CMD:bomb(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] != 8) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a Hitman Member.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pRank] < 5) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You not have minimum rank 5.");
    if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You're not in a vehicle.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][30] > -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "A bomb has already attached, type ''/cancel bomb'' to canceled the bomb.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMaterials] < 300) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You do not have enough materials. (300)");
    pInfo[playerid][aVar][30] = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), pInfo[playerid][pMaterials] -= 300, GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~bomb attached~n~press ''~p~click~w~'' to detonate", 4000, 3);
    return 1;
}

CMD:refill(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pJob] != 10) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not Mechanic.");
    if(gtm < pInfo[playerid][aSpam][16]) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can use this command once every 10 seconds.");
    new playerto;
    if(sscanf(params, "u", playerto)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/refill [playerid/name]");
    if(playerto == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[playerto][pStatus] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY,"Player not connected.");
    if(playerid == playerto) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't refill vehicle yourself.");
    if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerto)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player is not in any vehicle.");
    if(!ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, playerto)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player not near you.");
    if(IsABike(pInfo[playerto][aVar][1])) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't refill bikes.");
    switch(pInfo[playerto][pScore])
    {
        case 1..19: format(stmsg[playerto], 90, "* Mechanic %s offered you a 20 liters of fuel for 25.000$, (/accept refill).", GetName(playerid)), pProdMoney[playerto] = 25000, SendClientMessage(playerto, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerto]);
        default: format(stmsg[playerto], 90, "* Mechanic %s offered you a 20 liters of fuel for 28.000$, (/accept refill).", GetName(playerid)), pProdMoney[playerto] = 28000, SendClientMessage(playerto, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerto]);
    }
    format(stmsg[playerid], 60, "* You have offered %s a 20 liters of fuel.", GetName(playerto)), pProdOffer[playerto] = playerid, pProdType[playerto] = 13, SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
    return 1;
}

CMD:givelicense(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] != 7) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a member of School Instructor.");
    new playerto;
    if(sscanf(params, "us[8]", playerto, params)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/givelicense [playerid/name] [flying | sailing | weapon]");
    if(!ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, playerto)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player not near you.");
    if(!strcmp(params, "flying", true))
    {
        if(pInfo[playerto][pFlyLic] == 1 || pInfo[playerto][pFlyLic] > 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "The player has already flying license.");
        if((pInfo[playerto][pScore] > 0 || pInfo[playerto][pScore] == 9) && pInfo[playerto][pMoney] < 20000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "That player doesn't have enough money.");
        if((pInfo[playerto][pScore] > 9 || pInfo[playerto][pScore] == 49) && pInfo[playerto][pMoney] < 26000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "That player doesn't have enough money.");
        if(pInfo[playerto][pScore] > 49 && pInfo[playerto][pMoney] < 38000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "That player doesn't have enough money.");
        if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, 1957.2198,-2183.6379,13.5469)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not at the Airport Los Santos.");

CMD:live(playerid, params [])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] != 6) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not a member of News Reporters.");
    new playerto, price;
    if(!strcmp(params, "end", true) && pInfo[playerid][aVar][59] != -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "You have ended the live news conference."),
        SendClientMessage(pInfo[playerid][aVar][59], -1, "The live news conference has ended."),
        TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1), TogglePlayerControllable(pInfo[playerid][aVar][59], 1),
        pInfo[pInfo[playerid][aVar][59]][aVar][59] = -1, pInfo[playerid][aVar][59] = -1;

    if(pInfo[playerid][aVar][59] != -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You is already in live conference.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pMute] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You cannot speak, you have been muted.");
    if(pInfo[playerid][pRank] < 3) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You not have minimum rank 3.");
    if(sscanf(params, "ui", playerto, price)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/live [playerid/name] [price]");
    if(playerto == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[playerto][pStatus] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY,"Player not connected.");
    if(price < 1 || price > 200000) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Live money can't be below 1$ or higher than 200.000$.");
    if(pInfo[playerto][pMute] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "The player have been muted.");
    if(!ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, playerto)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player not near you.");
    if(playerto == playerid) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You cannot talk Live with yourself.");
    format(stmsg[playerid], 64, "* You offered %s a Live News Conference for %s$.", GetName(playerto), FormatNumber(price));
    SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
    format(stmsg[playerto], 96, "* Reporter %s offered you a Live News Conference for %s$, (/accept live).", GetName(playerid), FormatNumber(price));
    SendClientMessage(playerto, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerto]);
    pInfo[playerto][aVar][73] = playerid, pInfo[playerto][aVar][74] = price;
    return 1;
}

}

CMD:payplayers(playerid, params[])

    foreach(new i : Player) if(pInfo[i][pScore] <= lvl) { GiveMoney(i, price), count++; }

    return 1;
}

CMD:injection(playerid, params[])

    switch(pInfo[playerid][pUpgr][0])
    {
        case 0: { if(health >= 100) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You do not need to healed.");
            SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health+25), GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health); if(health > 100) SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100); }
        default: { if(health >= 100+(3*pInfo[playerid][pUpgr][0])) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You do not need to healed.");
            SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health+25), GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health); if(health > 100+(3*pInfo[playerid][pUpgr][0])) SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100+(3*pInfo[playerid][pUpgr][0])); }

    return 1;
}

CMD:heal(playerid, params[])
{
    if(pInfo[playerid][pHouse] != -1 && IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 60, Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][IntX], Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][IntY], Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][IntZ]))
    {
        if(Houses[pInfo[playerid][pHouse]][hUpg][0] < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Health upgrade not available for this house.");
        SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~g~healed", 3000, 3);
        return 1;
    }
    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 35.0, 2808.8506,-1170.0601,1025.5703) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 35.0, 959.6634,-50.7865,1001.1172)
    || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 35.0, 2324.4097,-1141.0220,1050.4922) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 35.0, 954.2118,91.8105,1001.2659)
    || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 35.0, 288.6301,167.6000,1007.1719) && IsACop(playerid)) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 55.0, 297.3927,186.7046,1007.1719)
    || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 40.0, 259.9833,176.6490,1003.0234) && IsACop(playerid)) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 35.0, 359.1716,162.0875,1003.2188)
    || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 45.0, 1753.2765,-2008.9558,20.6425) && vwp[playerid] == 1) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 35.0, 1722.0134,-1663.4160,20.2298)
    || (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 45.0, 869.7687,-1628.5071,40.0807) && pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 7) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 45.0, 2176.4055,1618.6990,999.9766) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 35.0, 1211.6697,-34.1224,1001.5000))
        return SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~g~healed", 3000, 3);

    if(pInfo[playerid][pMember] == 4)
    {
        if(vVar[1][pInfo[playerid][aVar][1]] != 13) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not in a Paramedics vehicle.");
        new playerto;
        if(sscanf(params,"u", playerto)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/heal [playerid]");
        if(playerto == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[playerto][pStatus] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY,"Player not connected.");
        if(playerid == playerto) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You can't give health yourself.");
        if(GetPlayerHealth(playerto, health) == 100) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "The player does not need health.");
        if(pInfo[playerto][pMoney] < 1500) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "That player doesn't have enough money.");
        if(!ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, playerto)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player not near you.");
        format(stmsg[playerto], 79, "* %s wants to you full health for 1.500$, (/accept heal).", GetName(playerid)), SendClientMessage(playerto, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerto]);
        format(stmsg[playerid], 59, "* You offered %s full health for 1.500$.", GetName(playerto)), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_PRODS, stmsg[playerid]);
        pProdOffer[playerto] = playerid, pProdType[playerto] = 5, pInfo[playerid][pRPT] += 1;
        return 1;
    }
    if(Iter_Contains(Train[pInfo[playerid][pMember]], playerid)) return SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100), GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~g~healed", 2500, 3);
    return 1;
}

CMD:getincar(playerid, params [])

    new suspect;
    if(sscanf(params, "u", suspect)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/getincar [playerid/name]");
    if(!IsPlayerConnected(suspect)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY,"Player not connected.");

CMD:frisk(playerid, params [])
{
    if(!IsACop(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "You are not part of a team.");

    new suspect;

    if(!ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, suspect)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "Player not near you.");
    new Float:tempheal, Float:temparmour, Player_Weapons[13], Player_Ammos[13], weaponName[40];
    GetPlayerHealth(suspect,tempheal), GetPlayerArmour(suspect,temparmour);
    format(stmsg[playerid], 170, "|_____ {4D97FF}%s {FFFFFF}(Health: {828282}%.1f{FFFFFF} | Armour: {828282}%.1f{FFFFFF}) _____|", GetName(suspect),tempheal,temparmour);
    SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, stmsg[playerid]);
    if(pInfo[suspect][pDrugs] > 0 ? (format(stmsg[playerid], 50, "Drugs: {828282}%d{FFFFFF} grams.", pInfo[suspect][pDrugs]), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, stmsg[playerid]))
        : (format(stmsg[playerid], 50, "Drugs: {828282}No drugs."),  SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, stmsg[playerid])))
    if(pInfo[suspect][pMaterials] > 0 ? (format(stmsg[playerid], 50, "Materials: {828282}%d.", pInfo[suspect][pMaterials]), SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, stmsg[playerid]))

    SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, pInfo[suspect][pPhoneBook] > 0 ? ("Phone Book: {828282}Yes.") : ("Phone Book: {828282}No."));
    for(new i = 1;i <= 12;i++)

    pInfo[playerto][pExpWtd] = 0, PlayerTextDrawHide(playerto, ExpWanted[playerto]), pInfo[playerto][pWantedLevel] = 0, SetPlayerInteriorEx(playerto, 0), GiveInJail(playerto), SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerto, 0), RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerto, 3);

    case 2: format(strAll, sizeof(strAll), "* FBI Agent %s arrested suspect %s for %d seconds.", GetName(playerid), GetName(playerto), pInfo[playerto][pJailed], FormatNumber(pInfo[playerto][pBail]));
    case 3: format(strAll, sizeof(strAll), "* Soldier %s arrested suspect %s for %d seconds.", GetName(playerid), GetName(playerto), pInfo[playerto][pJailed], FormatNumber(pInfo[playerto][pBail])); }

CMD:mdc(playerid, params [])

    new playerto;
    if(sscanf(params, "u", playerto)) return SendSyntaxMessage(playerid, "/mdc [playerid/name]");
    if(playerto == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || pInfo[playerto][pStatus] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY,"Player not connected.");
    if(pInfo[playerto][pWantedLevel] < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_DARKGRAY, "That player is not wanted.");
    SendClientMessage(playerid, TEAM_BLUE_COLOR,"|______ M.D.C _______|");

    SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,stmsg[playerid]);
    if(pInfo[playerto][pWantedLevel] == 0 ? format(stmsg[playerid], 36, "Wanted level expire in: not wanted") : format(stmsg[playerid], 38, "Wanted level expire in: %d min.", pInfo[playerto][pExpWtd]/60))

    SendClientMessage(playerid, TEAM_BLUE_COLOR,"|___________________|");
    return 1;
}

}
